column3: Yesuss Kirstosay ba shempo nu gish aathi imida gish siqqoy azakone nu hessan eros. Nukka nu shempo nu ishata gish aathi imanas nus beses.
He woodeyka ayhudata paziga ba77elepe kase Yesussay hayssa allameza yedidi aawako bana saatey gakkiidaysa erridees, hayssa allamezan diza ba baggata wuris sqqides, wurisethi gakkanaasika dosides.
Xoossi istta bolla oyddu tammu laytha hanqettidayti istti oonanitee? Nagara oothin istta ahay bazzo biittan kundi attidayta gidetenee?
Inte azazetiza nayta gididi erontta dishe inte kase intes diza iitta qofa kaallopite.
Xoossi wursika maaranas asi wuriska azazetontta mala goridides.

Oyddu do7ata giddofe yida milatiza qaala siyadis; he giirethayka “kilos bagga gidizan gisttey issas issi gallasa damusakko. Qasse issi kilone bagga gidiza bangay issi gallasa damusa gido. zaytene woyne mith qohopa” gishin ta siyadis.
Goda sinththan inte intena kawushite qasse izi intena dhooqu dhooqu histtana.
Izi ba doosidade baggara biita bolla xiillotethan pirdana gallas bare woththides. Izakka hayqqope denththidi asa wursios hayssa tummatetha errissides.
Wotadaratikka aguunththa zawuude xaxiidi Yesussa hu7en woththida, zo77o kabakka mayzzida.
Hessa gish azinati hayqqida naatetha maaccashshati adde gelana mala, nayta yelana malane ba soo as ayssana mala, morkeykka istta bolla wooththiza miishshe demmontta mala ta zorayss.
Tan aawan diza mala aawayka tanan dizaysa inte ammanite, akaye gikoo ta ooththiza oththota gishika tana ammanite.
ayqoyne duufoy tama abba giddo yegettida. Hessika he tama abbazi nam7antho hayqokko.
Hessa mala gidizako kiristoosay alamey medhetosope haa simmin daro wode meto ekkanas besses. Ha7 qasse wode wurisethan bena yarshidi nagara diganas wurisethas issi to qonccides.
Oyddu taammu laythth kumeth istta bazzo biitan danddaides.
Hessa gish ta ishato inte maana shiiqiza wode issay issara naagetite.

Hessafe guye he dorisay usupuntho matameza doyin tani gede izako xeelladis. Heko biittay wolqama qaath qaxxides. Aawa arishey asi kayos mayiza karetha mayo mala karexides. Aginayka kumethara suutha mala zo7adus.
Macashatas hayqidayti paxida baggayti qasse hessafe aadhiza hayqope denthi demmanas giidi hayqope atethi leqidi hayqos bena aathi immida waayepe atanas koybeyttena.

Phawulossay qass “Nu Roome yelleteth gidishin pirday bayindda dere sinthan duriqara bukkidine qasho keeththan yeegida. Histtin ha7i qass nuna qootara asi errontta kessana koyzoo? hessi hanena, istta yidi berkka birsheto” gidees.
“Laymatopa”, “Wodhopa”, “amotofa” gizaytane hara azazoti diikokka “Asi wursaka ne mala siiqa” giza hanno issi wogayn wurikka kuyettides.
Haysa izan ufaysa oothizay wuri izi gesh gidida mala bena geshes.
Tani ta gaathara Xoossa wogan ufa7istays.
Ay wodeka Godan ufa7etite. Qasseka ta intena ufa7ettite gayss.
Hessa taas ooni yootidakone erana gaada ta guye yuuya xeelliza wode woriqafe oothetida istta billa wothiza laapun balata beyadis.
Izas azazetontta ixxidaytape attin iza shemposo gelontta mala izi caaqi digiday haray oonanitee?
Tape kasse ydayt wuri kaysoone bonqqzayta doorssat gidkoo istt giza siybetena
Inteno Asas oothi aqqizayto! intena oothisiza godatas bonchon azazetite. Inte azazistanay lo7otasine ashikistas xalala gidontta hanko iittatassarakko.
Iza bolla “Hayssi addezi Haysa geesha sooza bollane woga bolla cashsha qaala hasa7a mullekka aggibeyna.
Hessi wuri handay izi nuna benara Kiristoosa baggara maqaynithidine maqaynitho ootho nuusu immida Xoossanko.
Ta ishato Goda sunththan intes yootida nabeta wayetethinne istta danda7a intes lemuso histti xeellite.
Goda sunththu xeeyigizay wuri attana.
Hizgida “Amin7i! sabay, gitatethi, erateth, galatay, bonchoy, wolqayne minotethi nu Godas Xoossas medhinape medhinas gido amin7i”
Inte lo7etethi coo mela hu7e dathanine worqan gexxetethan, al7o mayo mayon, coo mela ayfen beettiza geexen gidopo.
Hessa gish Goda gish markkateth woykko Goda gish qachchetida tanan yeellattopa. Gido attin Xoossa wollqqara miishshiracho qaala gish tanara meto ekka.
Istt tumape nes duma ass gidida mala tanika tana istta gish dummasays.
Beega! hayqqana matidayssane nees wurishe guuthu attida wolqayo zaara mintha. Tani ta Goda sinthan ne oothoy kumeth gidin beyabeyke.
Hedzdzantho kiitanchay ba xu7aza shaapata bollane pulto haathata bolla gusides. He isttika suuthu gidida.
Hayssa ha ammanozan miinid diza kiyatethan nuni geliday iza baggara gidida gishshi ufayssan Xoossa boncho gishetti ekizayta gidida gishshi nu ufa7etosu.
Qasseka inte laymatizaytas woykko tuanatas woykko uzetizaytas Kiristossa kawotethanine Xoossa kawotethan istas latasoy bayndaysa inte eriite. Uzetethi eqqas goyno malakko.
Abiramey bees laata biitta ekkanas xeyigettida wode ammanon azazetides. Awa bizakone erontta aggikoka ero gi bides.
Ayanay kumidayta gidite atiin mathosiza ushan mathotofiite. Hessi meela miishe lallethikko.
Hessa geedon daro asay yeelachiza istta ogeza kaalles. He istta oothoza geedon tuma ogey cayettes.
Nu wurikka iza bagara isi ayanan awwa ach shiqqana danda7os.

Hinkko Ayhuda gidonta asape ammanidayta gish gidiko <Eeqqas shuketidi tunidayssa mooppite, suththuka uyoppite, shuketidi suththi biitan gukonta bawutta hayqqida mehe asho moppite, laymmafe hakiite> giidi cimmati qachchida qaala dabbidabe xaahaaththaidi nu isttas yeddidos.”

Qasse Phixxirossay “haysso Hannaniya neni Xiillo Xyana bolla wordotanasine gade miishshafe ashshana mala xalla7ey ayys ne wozinan gellidee? Bayzanappe kasse gadez neeysa gidene? Ne bayzadeppe guye qasse miishshay ne kushshen deenee? Histtin ne hayssa mala wossita ne wozinnan qoppadii? Ne Xoossa bolla wordotadassa attin asa bolla gideena” gides.
Hesa gish aba bolla dendiiza gote caarkoy hene ha shocechiza mala dumma dumma timirte carkon asa geneninne balethon anne nuni hene ha phonqitise qeeri gutha nayta mala hanoko.
Makal7anchati Xoossa kawoteth gelonttayssa ereketii? Hessa mala yoon baletopite. Laymmatana qaqatizayti, eeqqa eqqizaytine addey addera laymmatizayti,
Ane nu wuriso gallas issay issara gakki gakki issay issa minthethos attin issi issi asati shiiqo aggida mala ane nuni shiiqoza aggokko. Harapeka Goda Yussay matatidaysa qopishe kasep minni shiqite.
Hessa gishshi intes biitta bolla diza amoteth digite. Heytika layma, tunateth, asho amo, iitta amotethine eeqas goyno mala gidida gaphigaphokk.
Nu qass gaallasa asata gidida gish ammanone siiqo tiran mayiza asa mayo mala mayidi atotetha ufayss hu7en woththiza asa qoobe mala nu hu7en woththidi ane nunatetha haaridi deyoos.
Xoossi nuus nu nu hu7e haranass Xoossa wollqqa eranasinne siiqistana ayyana immides attin babo ayana immibeyina.
“Ta iza erays” Gishe iza azazo polontade gidiko he uray wordo asa attiin tumay he uran dena.
Hesa woode iza oykanass koydaa, gido attin buroo wodey gakibeyna gish oonnika oykkbeyna.
Lo7o oothana malanne lo7o oothon durista gidana mala, keyatane shaakki immanas dosizayta gidana mala asa azaza.
Istti qasse “Haysi addeezi iita oosonttade gididako nu iza nes aththi immokoko shin” gida

Issi gallas hara galasafe dummasi qopizadey izi hessa oothizay Goda bonchos gidiko mizadeyka Goda bonchos giidi meesi. Miidi Xoossu galates. Monttadeykka Goda bonchos giidi muusu aggesine Xoossas galata immees.
Ufayssan ufa7etizayta gidite; meto danida7ite; woossan minnite.
Phawulossa naggiza xeetu olla asa hallaqay “iza daroo wayisontta loo7etha nagga; iza laggeeti izas koshshiza miishshi ekki yiikko diggofa” gides.
Siiqoy wurso wode danda7es. Wuriso wodeka ammanes. ufays oothesine minni eqees.
Kase geesha maxaafan xaafetida mala “Ta ammanida gishshi hasa7adis” geetetidaysa mala nuka hessa he ammano ayanan ammaniza gishshi hasa7osu.
Ta ishato nu intena “ootho oothontta asata hanqqetite; babbizayta minssite; daaburanchata maadite; asi wurthth danddaite” gi zorosu.
Ichachantha kiitanchay ba xu7a do7aza alga bolla gusides. He do7aza Kawotethi qass dhumides. Asay qass waayezape dendidayssan berka ba inxxaris gariccides.
Haysa ha azazoza kaalliza wurisosine Xoossa dere gidida Isra7elistas saroyne marotethi gido.
Izi Goda ogge tammaridadene Yesussa gish balay bayinida hasaizadene xiillo ayanan xuugetishe tammarisizade; gido attin izi loo7ethi errizay yanssa xinqqate xaalala.
Histiko inte ay miikoka ay uykoka woykko aykoka oothiko wursika Xoossa bonchos oothite.

Inte qase izape ekida xiillo ayanay intenan diza gish haray oonikka intena tamarisanas bessena. Izi intena tamarisanays tumu attin worido gidena; Hessa gish xiillo ayanay intena tamarisida mala kirstoosana deyite.
Shemppofe shaakettida ashoy hayqeeth gidida mala oothopekka shaakettida ammanoy hayqethikko.
Izi hessa gidape guye kathth ekkidi xoossu galatidi asa wursso sinththan kaath muussu oykkides.
Gido atin eeqqan tuniidaytappe, layman tuniidaytappe, bawuuta hayqqida mehe asho mussafenne suuthu ushshafe hakkana mala nu isttas xaafana beeses.
Herakka Phawulossay Hananiya “Haysso paanara tiyetida keethazo; nenakka Xoossi shoccana; wogara pirdana uttada wogay baayindda tana shoccana mala azazazi?” gidees.
Hessa gishshi Yesus Kiristoosa ammanizayta bolla piriday deena.
Xoossi nu atoteth Goda Yesuss Kiristtossa baggara demmana mala attin nuna hanqqos xeygibeytena.
Alame bolla diza heytika googene magoge geetettizayta balethanasine istta olas ekki baanas kezana; heytantta qooday abba achchan diza ace malakko.
Intefe issi issi asati heytantta malako shin ha7i qass Goda Yesus Kiristoosa sunthanine nu sunthanine nu Xoossa ayanan mecettidista, dummatidistane xiillidista.

Ta meto beeyizaykka hessa gishiikko. Gidikkokka ta oona ammanizakkone tani ta ammanizade shaakka eriza gish izan yeellatikke. Ta izas immida hadara he gaallasiya gakkanaas izi naaganas danddaizayssa ta shaakka eradis.
Wossan ay hanonka ayanan wosite. Hesa qopiidi begiite amanizayta wuriso gish qanxxonta wosiite.

Phawuloossape, Sillasepenne Ximitossape; Intes Xoossa Aawa Goda Yesuss Kiristtosayta gidida Taselonqqen diza ammaniza asas nu Aawa Xoossafene Goda Yesuss Kiristtoossa kiyatethinne sarotethi intes gido.
Inte kiyatethi asa wursio achchan e reto. Goday yaana matides.
Heyssa ukeetha inte miza wodene hayssa ushshaka uyiza wurso wode Goday yaana gakanas inte iza hayqo yotandista.
Ammanon wossida wossay hargidade pathana. Godaykka iza denthana. Izi nagara oothidade gidikokka Xoossi iza maarana.
Paccey bayindda gaallasine qama ne gish woosan qofisashe kase Aawati oothida mala geeshsha wozinara ta gooyinniza Xoossa ta galatayss.
Zumatane zaalataka “Nuna kammite! alga bolla uttidayssa sinthafe, he dorisaza hanqofe nuna qottite.

Ayanay woossa keethatas gizayssa haythey diza uray siyo! xoonida uras ta qotan diza man7afe immana. Iza bolla oratha sunthi xaafettida bootha shuchuka izas ta immana. Hessaka ekkidadefe attin hara uray oonka erenna.

Heyti wordo asttamareti miishas gaphigaphiza gishshi berka medhi ekkida yoo, yooti yootidi intes dizazi bees bonqqi ekkettes. Beni beni wodesope pirday isttas giigeti uttides. Addafe istta dhayoy naages.
Hessa geedon istti wordo yoo ammanana mala Xoossi istta bolla balla ootho kiittana.
Hesikka “Inte geedon Xoossa sunthi hanko dere asa achan cayetesi” geetetti xaafetida mala hanides.
Iyaneeseyine Iyanbbaaresey Muse bolla denddida mala haytikka istta qofay mooretin bees ammanope kunddida gish tumateth ixxettes.
Tani ta dosizayta wursa hanqayssine qaxxayayis. Hessa gishshi neni minna, maarotethanka gela.
Histiko nuni xiillida gishshi nu Goda Yesus Kirisitoosa baggara nuusu Xoossara sarotethi dees.
Ne duussa giishshine ne tamarsiza timirtezas naagetta, haytan miinna. Ne hessa oothiko nenane ne gizayssa siyizayta ashshana.

Daro wode Ayhudata wossa keethati dizason awankka istti qaaxxayistana malanne ba ammano kadana mala ooththadis; Istta bolla daro hanqqistadakka Isra7eleppe karen diza hara kaatamatakka baada ammanizayta goodadis.
Asho oothoy qonccen eretes hesika laymateth tunateth layma kasse (ziita)
Hessa gishshi dichchizay Xoossu attin tokizadeyka, Haathe ushshizadeyka aykoka gidetena.
Hessa gishshi inte Yessus Kiristoosay qonccana gallas naagishin ayana imotethatape aykoka intes paccena.

Salope wolqama piisa haatha giirethine wolqama dada giireth milatiza giirethika siyadis. Tani siyida giirethay diithi milatiza bagana geetettizayssa shoccodi asay sissiza giiretha mala giirizayssa siyadis.
Iza ammanidadeey wuri iza sunththan nagarafe maaro demmanayssa nabbeti izas markkatetes.
Lo7o ootho aggontta oothidi boncho sabane medhina dusi koyzaytas miidhina deyo immana.

Isiyan diza laapun woossa keethatas, Kaseka dizayssafe, ha7ika dizayssapene, buroka yaana Xoossafe iza aliga sinthan diza laapun ayanatape hessathoka hayqofe denthan bayra gididayssafe, ha biitta kawotas kawone ammanettida marika gididayssafe, nuna siiqizayssafene ba suunthan nuna nu nagarape geeshida Yesus kiristoosape kiyatethine, saroteth, intes gido.
Phawulossaykka isttas Yanssa ximmiqatay gidikko asay maarotethan simmidayssa beessiza ximmiqatakko, Yanssay ba baggara asay izape guyera yiza Yesussa ammanana mala yootides” gides.

Histin hessi wurikka hessa mala gidiko Goday bess goynnishe diza asata paacepe ashshanayssane nagaranchattaka wostti qaxxayanakoneka pirda gallassas wostti istta naagidi gathanakone hessa izi eress guusuko.
Ha7i hessafe aadhiza pude salon diza dere laamotetes. Hessa gishshi Xoossi isttas salon katama giigisida gishshi istta xalala Xoossa geeteti xeygistanas yelatibeyna.
Xoossu bonchisontta go7ay bayindda hayssu7eppene cima maaccashshata hayssu7eppe haakkada tuma ayana oothos ne asatetha giiggissa.
Istti kumetha biitta bolla laaletidi geeshati dizasoyo dosettida katamayo gidothida shin salope wodhdhida tamay istta dippi histti xuugides.
Hessa gish Yesuss kiristtossa sunththan xamaqqistana mala azazidees. Hessafe guye phixiroossay guththa wode isttara danna mala woossida.
Ne qoqista kallethizade dhuman dizaytas poo7o gididaysa ne amanetidade gidiko
Medhina deyoyi izi nuus immana gida ufaysa qaalako.
Sallope gidida eratethiya gidikko koyro geshshikko, guyepekka saroteth dosizaro, danda7izaaro, ero gizaro, marotethinne loo7o ayfey kumidarokko. Qasse worodo madontaronne ulon geney bayndaro.
Awaay ba na dosees haanizza yoo wurrsi iza kuseen yeegdees.
Issi issi asatas milatizayssa mala Goday ba yootida ufayssa qaala polanas gam7enako shiin asi wurikka maaristana malane ay asika dhayontta mala koyidi izi inte gishshi takkes.
Asi wuri ta mala machcho ekontta dizako ta dosayss. Gido attin issi issi asas Xoossafe imettida duma imotay dees. Issas duma issi imotay dees. Hankoyssas qass hara imotay dees.
Siiqo kaallite; ayana imotethata harapeka tinbite hasa7iza imotata lo7ethi koyte.
Kiristoosa sintthan Xoossi ba boncho eratethi poo7o nuus immanas “Poo7oy dhuman poo7o” gida Xoossi ba poo7o nu wozinan po7isides.
He wode issi Iskkinidiryya kataman yeellettida Aphphilossa geetettiza issi Ayuda asi ehaaththaesone yides; Izikka tammaridadene geshsha maxaafata loo7ethi errizadekko.
Hessaththoka Yesusay ba suutha baggara asa geeshanas katama pengefe Karen meto be7ides.
Hessa gish ne tamarsanayti heytanta. Hessakka ne kumetha Godatethara zoranne hanqqa nena oonikka kadhoppo.
Xossay nu garsan ba siqqo qonccsiday nu iza bagara deyo demanamala ba na isneza ha dugge ha alamezan yedidaysankko.
“ta aawawu! ne tana haysi biitayne saloy medhdhistanape kase dossida gish ne tas immidaa ta bonchoza istti beeyana mala hayta ne tas immidaytka ta dizasoon anara dana mala dossays.
Istta ogen dhayosoyne mulera dipp gi dhayoy dees.
Hessa gishshi pude salo bida qessista halaqa Xoossa na Yesusay nuus diza gishshi ane nuni nu ammano minthi oykosu.
“Tani izan ufa7ettizadey ta dosiza ta naazi hayssakko” giza qaala giireth gita bonchora izas yida wode izi xoossa Aawape bonchone gitatethi ekides.
Heyti wurikka he issi ayanay immiza imota gidishin issi issi uras ba koyida mala imees.

Oydantho kiitanchay ba zayeza punnides. Awa arishes cigoy, aginas cigoy, xoolinttistas cigoy shocettides. Hessa gishshi heytantta po7ope cigoy dhumides. Hessa malanka gallasafe cigoy omaris giddies. Hessaththoka omarissafe cigoy po7oy bayinda dhuma giddies.
He wode wurkka ayhude wossa keeththa hallaqa sositinesse geetettizayssa oykkidi pirde keeththa sinththan qoxxeerethida; Galyyossay gidikko hessa wudankka giibeyina.
Qasseka istti iza oykanas paacciida shin izi istta kushshepe keesi ekii bidees.
Hessa gishshi nu hidota qanxxoko; nuusu kare bagga asatethay dhay dhay bikkoka nuusi gaatha bagga asatethay gallas gallas ooraxxi ooraxxi bees.
Maramma daroo allo7o wagara shameetda liitroo bagga gidiza geshsha nardoosa shittoo ekka yada Yesussa too bolla gussada tooza ba huee ithkera quccadus, keethaka shittoo sawoy kummidees.
Alaga biittan bete asa mala buro nees immistana geetetida biittan ammanon uttides. Izas immetida ufayssa qaala izara issife laatana Yisaqa malane Yaqobem mala dunikanen deyides.
Ta ishato ane inte ta haniza mala tana kaallitene harataraka issife deyite. Nu nuna intes lemuso hisiti bessida mala diza asata wozinan wothite.
Isay isa dexxo toho toko hessamalan oothon Kirstossa wogga pollista.
Hessa gish asi ammanon xalala gidontta oothonkka xiillizaysa inte beyeista.
Histin nu ha7i ay ginoo? Xoossi besontta ogera maadi erizee? Muleka maadi erena.
Inte garisan ammanon buro minnonttade shiishi ekkite attin iza qofa bolla piridofite.
Salo bolla olay dendides. Mikkaleyne iza kiitanchati dawezara olettida. Dawezine iza kiitanchatika zaarid mikalerane iza kiitanchatara olettida.
Hanqetite shin nagara oothofite, iinte hanqon diishin awwa arshey wulofo.
Anjjite attin isttas iitta cashes, cashshe zaaropite. Inte xeeygetiday hessaththo oothid anjjo laatanaskko.
tana kittdayssi izi tanara dees, ay wodekka ta uhaaththaayzaz ooththiiza gish izi tana xaala yeegi aggibeyna” gidees.
Hesagishi inte daban tumu zinare dancetidi xiilotehta biirista mala tiran maydi.

Neni ta oshacha kushen beyida laapun xoolinttistane xompe, istta bola wothiza laapun worqqafe oothetida balata xuuray heko hayssakko. Laapun xoolintteti laapun woossa keethata kiittanchatakko. Xompe wothiza laapun worqqa ballati laapun woossa keethatakko.
Gido attin Xoossa kiyatethan asa wuriso gishshi hayqanas kiitanchatape guutha wode guuxida Yesusay waaye hayqo hayqidi ha7i bonchone galata zawude ba hu7en wothidayssa beyosu.
Xoossi intes azazetth immishe ba qofa wursieth gakanas inte gidon oothes.
Haysa ta intes yootzay ta uhaaththaaysii intenan gidana malane inte uhaaththaaysiika kumethth gidanasiko.
Nuus ufayss gidida yesus kiristtoossaninne nuna ashshida Xoossa azazon, Yesuss kiristtoossay kiittida Phawuloossape.
Hessathokka maccashshati bonchora bena shiishshi ekkidi beessiza mayo mayeto, attin ba hu7e daadi ekkidi woykko alli7o mayo, worqqanne inqufe aathidi walq walq guuppetto.
Hesa beydi wodoro durqafe doqqi ekidi asanne boratakka maqidqse gibefe kesidese, mishsh lamizyta mishaka dharcidi ista xraphezatakka shiri yagidass.
Hesika Xoossi kasse koyro nus gigisi wothida loo7o ootho nuni oothanamala Yesuss Kiristossa bagara nuni nam7antho medhetidaytane Xoossi medhetethatakko.
Ta siiqoto! inte tama mala paaciza meto giddon gelliza wode hessa malay kase bayinda ooratha miishey gakidazi intes milatin malalettopite.
Dorsaza sarge gallasi gakkida gishshine iza mishiraya giigista uttida gishshi haa yite; ane ufa7etos; ane ufayssan iza bonchos.
Intes birata qobe mala hu7en wothite. Ayana giththa masha ooykite heesikka Xoossa qalakko.
Izikka isi Giibixe assi Muse baga asappe isi ura bolla qooho gaathishin beyiddi ba bagga adeza madidi he Gibxe adeza wodhidi he qoheetidayssa hallo keesides.
Inte gidikko ta ishato loo7o ootho oothanape mulekka azaallofite.
Begite; ammanon minni eqqite; minnite; goobite.

Harappekka inte goynanaso othiida eeqqa Molookke dunkenane inte eqqa Refanne xollinnte misile dhoqu dhoqu hissti oykkidista. Hessa gisha ta intena inte dizasoppe dennthada Babiloonera aatha yeddana.” geetetidi xaahaaththaetides.
Hessa gish ta ishato inte minni eqqite, nu nu duunan gidin woykko kiittan woykko nu intes aathi yeddida timirtteza looethi oykkite.
Hessas nuna gigisiday Xoossuko. Buro yanaysas wase gidana mala nuusu ba ayana immiday izakko.
Maccashshi coou gaada kumeththara azazeteth tamaru.
Namm77u markkay woykko hedzdzu markkay markkatontta dishin cima bolla shiiqqiza mooto ekkofa.
Issay issa yeer yeer ekkidi sarothetite. Kiristoosan ammaniza woossa keeththa asay wurikka intena saro gees.
Be hu7en gudula qolidi yekkishene muuzotishe hizgi waassida “Abba bolla markabey dizayti wurka izi miishen duretidayti, hinna gita katamaya issi saate garsan mulera dhayida gishshi izis wo! wo!
Nuni Xoossa nayta getistana mala aaway darisi siqqida iza siqqoy nus aymla giitakko ane beyitte! Tumukka nu iza naytako. Alamey nuna eronta agiday iza eronta agida gishiko.

Hessaththoka inteno yeelagato! inte cimmatas azazetite. Inte wurikka ashiketethi afila mala maydi issay issas oothite. “Xooss otorizayta ixxes. Ashikkistass qasse ba kiyatethi immes” geeteti kasse geesha maxaafan xaafetides.
Mulekka diggena! Asi wurikka woridancha “Neni ne qaalape denidayssan tumanicha; Piridanika xonizade gidaasa” hessaththo geeteti xaafettida mala Xoossi qasse tumanicha.
Izi haa yiday ne sunththa xeeygizayta wurssi qachchanas qeessista halaqqatape godateth ekkiddikko.

Gido attin beni wode wordo nabeti dereza giddon dizayssa mala hessathoka ha7i inte giddon wordo asttamareti deyandettes. Heytantti asa dhayssiza wordo timirtte qottara diccana mala oothetes. Bena ashshida Godaka kaddidi bena eesson dhayssizazi ba bolla eheetes.
Hesa gason ayhudista dannat Yesussa wodhana malla kaseppe aththi denththethida, qase izi sammbatta morida gish xalla gidontta “Xoossi ta aawa” gida gishshinne bena Xoossara ginssida gishasa.
Inte taas wursi qopiza gishshine taape ekkida timirtteza lo7ethi oykida gishshi ta intena galatayss.
Dawiteykka iza gish hizzgides “Tanni Goda wurso wode ta sinththan beeyayis, izi ta oshachchan dees, mulekka hirigike.
Inte nam7antho yeelettiday medhinas minni diza dhayontta deyo Xoossa qaalan dhayontta zereththafe attin dhayiza zereththafe gidena.
Hessa gish intekka inte garisan issay issara inte nagara paxxetite; paxana mala issay issas wossite. Xiillo asa wossay wolliqara dees. Wollqama oothokka ooththees.
Ta intees tumma gays tanan ammanida asas medhina deyooy dees.
Aayane aaway bayndda naytta mala ta intena xalala agiike, ta simmada ha inteko yana.
Awaraka gidin go7ay daro. Harape koyro Xoossa qaalay hadara Ayudatasi immetides.
Othanchato inte Kiristossa azazetizamala biitta bolla intena oothisizaytasyashatethan bonchon sure wozinape azazetite.
woykko Xoossa kiiyatethi nena marotethako kallithizaysa shaaka erontta dashe iza gita kiiyatethane iza danida7a duretetha ne liiqazii?
Nu Xoossa sinth shiqqanas nus diza xalatethi hayssakko. Nu ay mishekka iza shene mala wosiko izi nu wossa siiyana.
Inite izan amaniza gish ufaysa Xoossi intesi ufaysine sarotethi kunitho. Hesikka xiillo ayana woliqa ufaysany intesi wogape adhi gukanasa. Haniko deretas othanicha gidida Phawulossa.
Yesussay kaqqetidason issi akakilitesoy dees. He akakilitezason oonnika moggetonttay oraththa dufooy dess.

Gido attin he do7azi oykettides. Kase izara daro malata oothida wordo nabeyka izara oykettides. Izi qass he do7aza malatay istta bolla dizaytane he do7aza misilezas goynidaytane gita malatata oothi oothidi istta balethishe gami7ides. Heyti nam7ati diine geetettiza taman exiza tama abban hayqqontta paxa dishe yegettida.
Halo kessanape “Neni ne morikey gafiko muza; izi saamotiko usha; ne hessaththo oothiko tama boniqo iza bolla korasa” geetetidi geeshsha maxaafan xaafetides.
Kiristoosa qaalay intenan kumeth gido. Inte inte garisan cinccatethara tamarttene zoretote. Mazumurenine saban ayana yethan galatara gathi inte wozinara Xoossas yexxite.
Azinato inte inte machcheta siiqitene isttas menxxe (meqeth) iittopite.

Ammaniza maaccashi oonikka ba soo asa giiddon amm7eti diza gidikko woosa keethi tumu amm7ista xaalla maaddana mala izakka ba baggara ba amm7ista maaddu attin woosa keethas tooho gidana mala aaggaguupu.
Iza marikatethaykka Xoossi medhina deyo nus imides, he deyoyka iza nazan dees, gizaysakko.
Nazi dizades deyoy dees; Xoossa nay bayndades deyoy baawa.
Histtko nazi intena wozikko inte wozettidayta gidana.
Hessa gish inte bonchetana mala tani inte gish ta bolla gakida wayezan inte ufaysi qanxonta mala ta intena hadara gays.
Heytantta mala asati Yesus kiristoosas oothizayta gidontta ba qanththa kaththa gishshi oothizaytakko. Shugo qaalara haasa7anine wozina kiya asata balethetes.
Wuriso baggara makali7ane iittateth, yiiqene iitta oothon xalala kumida; qanatetethan, shemmipo wodhon, ooshshan, balethoninne genen kumidayta qasseka zigirizayta gidida.
Nees immettida lo7o hadara nunan diza xiillo ayyanan naaga.
Be asho amo kunthanas zerizadey ashope dhaysi buccana. Ayana ufaysanas zeridadey gidiko ayanape medhina deyo buccana.
Istta garisafe issi issi asati Goda paccidine shoshan duketi hayqqi dhaydayssa mala nuka ane Goda paccoko.
Bessonttaz oothena, berika ba go7a xalala xeelena. Qoho qoodan yegena.
Biratape oothetida xurure geetettiza mayo mala tira bolla mayiza mayoy isttas dees. Istta qefey giiriza giirethay olas togettiza daro parane para gaareta giiretha mala giires.
Ta yada isttas yootonttako isttas nagara gidenashin, hai qass istta nagaras haano giza gasooy bawa.
Ammanontta asatara intes diza hanotethan cinccatethan Simeretite. Intes beettida lo7o qaadan go7etite.
Hayssafe guye nu nagarasi aylle gidontta mala nagara asatethay kiichana mala kase nu ceea asatethay izara isife kaqetidayssa nu erosu.
Xoossa naytinne xala7e nayti shaketi eretizay hessankko. Xillo oothontayinne ba isha siqqontay wuri Xoossafe gidena.
Nagaras haretiza wozinay Xoossara ooshshakko. Gaasoykka izi Xoossa wogasi haretennane haristanas danida7ena.
Hessa gish ta wozinay uhaaththaa7etes, ta dunaykka galates, ta ashshoy uhaaththaayssan dees.
Gidena. Ammanontta asay shiishiza yarshoy Xoossas gidontta xala7eskko. Intes xala7e era issipetethi daana mala ta koyke.

Anxxokiyan diza wossa keeththan nabetine asttamareti deetes. Heyitika Barinabassane Negeere geetettiza simmoonara qarrena dere ass lukiyosara herodossara isfe diccida minaherane sawulera wuri isfe deetes.
Intena oonikka worido hasa7on balethofo. Gasoyka Xoossa hanqoy izas azazetonta nayta bolla yanay haytanta malana.
Heytanta co77u histethi beses. Gaasoyka isti besonta oogera bes go7a demanas besonta timrte tamarson keeththa asa wursi moron detes.
Yesussay “inte wurikka gesh gidekista” giday iza aththi immanadey oonnakone erriza gishshsiko.
Ta intes tummu gays, doorssata yire penggerape attin hara baggara guupi geliizaay kaysoone bonqqizzade.
Istti suure ogeza aggagidi dhayida. Iitta ootho ootthidi demmiz miish siiqqida Bi7ore naa Bala7ame oge biidi balettida.
He wode Ayhudatine ayhude gidoontta hinkko derey bena kaalleththizaytara isfe gididi istta wayissanasine istta shuchchan caadanas koyda.

Hedzdzanththo “Yoona na Simmoona Ne tana doossay?” gides. Izi hedzdzanththo “Ne tana dossay” gida gish Pixroossay michchetidine “Godo ne ubbaa errasa ta nena dosizayssakka errasa” gides, Yesussayka qasseka “Ta doorisata hemma” gides.
Harassiza miishey muleka gede izin galena. Tunateth oothizaytine wordo hasa7izayti muleka hee iziko galena. He iziko gelanayti istta sunthi kase he dorsaza deyo maxaafan xaafetidayta xalalakko.

He macashaya geela7o mala mayone zo7o mayo mayadus. Worqan, boncho shuchanine inqqo geetettiza ali7o miishi mayada polayasu. Izi ba kushen qass iitta shuuniza miishene ba tuna laymmatethazi izan kumida worqa xu7a oyka uttadus.
Hessa wurso bolla wursi kumetha issifetethan shiishi qachchiza siiqo mayite.
Yesussayka isttas hizzgdes “heko asa nay bonchetza saatey gakkides.
Ne hara asay laymatontta mala yootashe nees laymaytazii? Nees Eeqa ixxasashin Xoossa keeththa miisha bonqqazii?
Nagaray qasse wogape kezida azazoy bessida ogen go7ettidi ta gidon dumma dumma iitta amo denithethides. wogay yanappe kasse nagaray hayqithiko.
Isra7ele asa kushepene ta nena isttakko kittiza Ayhuda gidoontta dere asata kusheppekka ashshana.
Nukka kasse qofay bayndaytane azazetontayta ne balletizayta duma duma amoninne loo7o dusas ayletethan haretizaytakko. Asarane nurka nu gasanka oyetishe itatethaninne miqaynetethan doos.
Xoossanine Yesuss Kiristtoossan doorettida kiittanchata sinththan hayta azazota oonakka maaddontta ne naaggana malane issi miishshikka ta gooripe ziq dhooqu histtontta mala nena hadara gays.
Hessagishshi gita waggay diza kase inte ammanotethiyo agopite.
Hadara ekidaytika ammanettidayta gidanas besses.
Phixiroossaykka issi simmona geetettiza galliba qaaccizadeera yophphen daroo wode deydees.
Inte inte hu7es Xoossa woossa keethe gididayssane Xoossa ayanay inte giddon dizayssa ereketii?
Hessa gishshi ta ishato nuni Yesus kiristoosa suutha baggara gede wurisofe dumma geeshi geetettizasoyo gelanas xalateth demmidosu.
Yesussay qasseka “ta bana shin inte tana koyanane inte inte nagarara hayqana attin ta bizaso bana danddaekista” gides.
Hessa gishshi duuma gididi dosetidayto, inte Xoossas dooretidayta gidida mala michetethine kiyateth, ashiketeth, bonchone danda7a mayite.
Tas ooththana koyzadey tana, tas ooththzadey ta dizason dana, tas ooththzade ta aaway iza bonchana.
Be nayta bees azazetizaytane asi bonchizayta histti dichchidi ba keeththa asa wogara ayssizzade gidanas beesses.
Hessa gish tumape inte hai oothizayisa malakka issay issara minettite; issay issa minsso.
Inte koyro siydara nu nu garisan siiqistana beses getetida kiitaya hanoko.
Hayssa ha7i wode meto gaason inte ha7i diza mala dizako taas lo7o milates.
Parsawista baga ass gidida ayhudata hllaqappe issi Niqodimossa getetizaday assi dess.
Hesathokka laymman diza Era7aba kiiteti bida asata mokka ekada hara ogera moyza yedida gish ba oothon xiillabeykee?
Gidikkoka maccashshi ammanonine siiqqon geeshshatethan berkka bena haaron miinnikko naa yelon attana.
Ha Isra7eele dere Xoossi kasse nu aawatta doorides, Istti gibixxe biittan dishshin istta dhoqqu dhoqqu histtidees. Be wolliqamaq qessera heepe istta kesiides.
Assa wozina erriza Xoossi nus immidayssa mala isttaskka xiillo ayana immidi istta bees ekkidayssa markkatides.
“Laymatopa” gidadey izikka zaaridi “wodhopa” gides. Ne laymatontta agikokka ne asa wodhikko wogape adhiidade gidaassa.
Ta isttas medhina deyoo immana, muleeka istti dhayetena, istt ta kushshepe woththii ekkanas danadey oonnika dena.
Sarotetha Goday xala7e eeson inte too garisa aathi dinccerethana. Goda Yesus kiristoosa kiyatethi intenara gido.
Ammaniza asi milatanaashin ammanos diza wollqqa kaadana. Heyta malatappe ne haakka.
Hessaththoka nuni darota gidi uttidi Kiristoosan issi ashoko. Nuni issay issas ashokko.
Hesikka amanetida qaala. Xoossa amanizayti loo7o oothos bena aathi imanamala hayssa ubbaa ne lo7etha yotanamala ta koyays. Hesikka loo7one ay asika koyizaza.
“Abramey Xoossu ammanides; He amanoy izas xiillotethan qoodetides” giza maxaafa qaalay poletides; izikka Xoossi dosidade geetettides.
Ta ishato inte bonchettida Goda Yesussa Kiristosa ammanizayta gidida mala asse besontta ogera maadofiite.
Istta duunay doya diza duufo mala istta duunay wuriso wode hasa7ees. Istta meterishay shoosha marzzera dees.”
Azinatika hessaththo ba machcho ba ashsho mala siiqanas beses. Be machcho siiqizadey bena siiqes.
Histin nu ay giinoo? Amanon bettida xiilloteth demanas hanko dere asay daburontta demides.
Ammanos xuura, loo7o qofara naaganas beesses.

Ammaniza godati diza ammaniza ashshikarati godati istta ishatas gidida gish godatas beessiza boncho immetto. Harapekka istta oothon maadetiza ammaniza godati isttas dosettidayta gidida gish nekka haytantta mala yoota tamarththanasine zoranas beesses.
Isttafe issi issi uras ammanoy baynida aggiko Xoossa ammanotethi diigizee?
Gido attin wotadarata garssafe issadey toorara iza miileen cadiin heeraka suththine haththi gukkidees.
Ta intes immiza azazoy ta intena siqqida mala inteka inte garssan isay isara siqqistanasiko.

Inte asatetha iitta ootho oothiza mishi oothi nagaras harisopite. Hessa mala oothanape hayqope gede deyon pinida asata mala intena Xoossa harisite. Inte asatetha xiillotetha miishsha mala Xoossas harisite.
Nuni gidiko ammanidi attidayta baggako attin gede guye unddudi dhayzayta bagga gidoko.
Hessa gishshi Isiraa7eele nayti wurikka attana. “Ashshizadey Xiyonepe yaana; Yaqobepeka iittateth digana.
Istti Goda Yesussane kase nibistakka wodhdhida; nunakka goodida; Xoossuka ufayssibeytena; Asa wursora eqetizade gidida.
Nuni tuma shaaki eridi ekkidayssafe erishe nagara oothiko hayssafe guye nagaras shiiqanas hara yarshoy deena.
Xoossi nuna Kiristossara gathi denthides. Yesuss Kiristossa bagara nuna sallon benara utisides.
Nu wurikka issi asho gidida gish wordotethi digidi nuni nu garasan issay issara anne tumma hasa7os.
Hayta ha asatasi nuni isitoka hafeti beyko. Hesikka inte wongile tumatethan eqi danamala gidiko.
Hessa gishshi hara qaalan hasa7iza uray ba hasa7idayssa birshechi erana mala bess woosso.
Sawuley Goda ammaniiza asa wodhannas ceqetishshe qeessista halaqqako bidees.
Ta qasse hai neko bays, ta ha biita bolla dashshe hayssa yootizay ta uhaaththaaysi isttan polistana mala gada yootays.
Hessafe bollara Kiristoosa bonchoy qoncciza wode inte keehi ufa7istana mala inte izara iza waayeza ekkizayta gidida mala ufa7etite.
Ta tiish histta xeelishin oyddu toora diza meheista, woora doo7ata, biita bolla gochchetiza medheteththatane salo bolla piradhdhiza kafoota beeyadiis.
Ha7i gidiko hanqo, yiillo, caashe, zigirisine yeellasiza hasa7a heytantta milatizayta wurs digite.
Izikka isttaththo dunkkana sikkizade gidida gish istta achchan uttidi dunkkana sikkon gellides.
Hessa gishshi iitta oothana koyza iitta asho qofa koydi hayqida inte asatetha bolla nagaray kawotana mala oothofite.
Heyta mala asati ba ootho co7u gi oothana malane ba kath maana mala Goda Yesuss Kiristtoossa sunththan nu istta azazoosine zoroos.
He qommota awatti yosefo bolla qanattetidi iza aylletethas duge Gibixe bayzzida. Gido attiin Xoossi izara dees;

Istta garssafe issay Agabossa geetettizays denddi eqqidi xiillo ayanay iza beesin allame wursion gita koshshay deenddanayisa yootides. Hesikka Rome kawo Qalawudosa qesare geetettizayssa kawootetha wode pooletides.
Hessafe guye Phawulossay wursio asara gullibatidi wossides.
Yesuss Kiristossas gididayti asho iza ita qofarane iza ita amotethara gathi kaqqida.
Ta ishato inte bolla duma duma wayey gakkiiko hessa wursi ufaysan qoodite.
Nu dhuman simeretishe izara nuusu isipetethi dees; Nu giiko wordotosu attin tuman dokko.
Nuni Pharite asay Meede asay Eelame asay Mesphphoxxomiyan Yudan Qaphedoqqiyan phanxxosan Isiyan,
Hessaththoka Godas bessiza duusu daana mala inte iza poli ufayssana mala lo7o ootho wurson ayfe immana malanne Xoossu eron dicci dicci baana mala nu intes woossos.
Ta naa Ximttosa ne gish kasetidi yootettida mala hayssa azazoza ta nees immadis. Hessikka ne he qaala kaalashe loo7o baaxe baaxistanasskko.
Hessafe guye daro asa qaala giireth milatza gita qaala giireth salope siyadis. Xosu Hale luuya! Atotethi bonchoy wolqayka nu Godaskko.
Intene inte qohida qoho gishine inte nagara gason hayqodaytakkko shin,
Xala7e ushshune Goda ushshu inte issife gathi uyana danda7ekista. Goda maadafene xala7e maadafe nam77afe gathi maana danda7ekista.
Laymay woykko tunatethi woykko uzetethi mulekka inte gidon betoy attin zigirsikka siyetofo. Hesamala gesha Xoossa asas besena.
Geshatas mishi wurikka geshsha shin tuatasinne amnontaytas gidikko wurikka tunakko. Harapekka ista qohaaththaaykka wurikka tunides.
Siyida asay wuri “haysii yerussalamen ha sunththa xeeygizayta dhayisiza addeza giidene? Qasse izi ha yiday he asata qachchi ekki qeessista halaqatako ehaaththaanas gideene” gishe malaletida.
Gido attin Yesusay gido geli cimatiza caaqo qaalay kaseyssafe adhizayssa mala izi ekkida oothoyka kaseyta oothope aadhes. Hesssika kaseyssafe lo7iza ufayssa qaalanko.
Taas duusu guusi kiristoosako. Hayqoyka taas go7ako.
Intenan lo7o ootho doommmidayssi izi Yesus kiristoosay wursietha piridas yaana gakanas intena danda7issanayssa ta ammanays.
Intes danida7etiko inte inte baggara asi wurisora saron diite.
Nuusu ufayssa qaala immidadey ammanetizade gidida gishshi nuni ammanidi iza gishshi marikatiza ufayssafe hee haa goontta ane lo7ethi oykkos.
Ta intes sarooteth aggada bays, ta sarootethika ta intes immana, ta intes immiza sarootethi derey immiza sarooteththa mala gidena, inte wozinay hirggofoone baboofo.
Nuni ashon diza wode wurson Godape haak dizaysa erikoka izan ammanetid doosu.
Ta qaala siydi oosonttade bolla pirdanay tana gidike, gasooyka ta yiday dere ashshanas attin dere bolla pirdanas gidena.
Iita baga gididi ba isha isethi wodhiida Qayele mala gidopite. izi aazas wodhiide? Gasoykka iza oothoy ita isha oothoy loo7o gididasa.
Abba gidon diza dereti wurikka baqatida, zumatika betibeyttena.
Hessa gishshi hayssa hayqqida asa mala qoodetida issi Abiramepe salo xoolintte malane abba ace mala qooday bayndda daro zerethay beettides.
Hessa gish medhinas hayqqi eroontta, ayhaaththaen beeti eroontta berkka xaalla Xoossu gidida kawoos medhdhinape medhdhina gakkanaas izas bonchoyine galatay gido. Ammiinn77i.
Izika ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Xoossaa babbitene iza bonchite. Iza pirida wodey gakides. Salone biitta, abbane haatha, pulttoka medhida Xoossas goynnite” gides.

Ammanizayta qooday dari dari biza wode girkke biittafe yida ayhuda asati yudan diza ayhuda asa bolla garssara zigiretida, gasooykka wursio wode miza kaathi gishishe ammiista wudan yegontta aggida gishasiko.
Inte xeeygettidayka hessaskko. Inte iza lemuso kaallana mala Kiristoosay inte gishshi waaye ekkidi intes lemuso gidides.
Nu intenara diza wode “ootho oothanas dosontta asi kaathth moopo giza azazo intes immidos.
Xoossa na ammanizay wuri medhina deyo demanappe attin dhayonta mala Xoossi hayssa alameza daro siqida gish ba mixi issi na immides.
Tuna ayanaykka “ta Yesussakka errayss, Phawulossakka errayss shin inte qass oonnantte?” gides.
Hessaththoka do7azine biitta Kawoti istta ola asayka bootha Parazoza toggidayssarane iza ola asara olettanas shiiqidayta beyadis.
Issiya abba achan diza dereta biza markkaben gillidi bidos. Tesellonqqen diza issi Maqidonyya asi Arisxxirokossa geetettizadey nunara dees.
Qachcho keeththan dizaytara inteka qachettida mala isttas qopite. Hessaththoka asa kushen waayetizaytara inteka waayetiza mala isttas qopite.
Iza baggara Xoossa Aawas galata shiishishe qaalan gidin woykko oothon inte oothizayssa wurs Goda Yesusa sunththan oothite.
Qala tamarizay onika ba tamarida loo7o misha ba astamarera gishetes.
Haray atoshin issi toy eqiza gadey izas hayssafe immetibeyna. Gido attiin he wode izas issi naykka baynnida dishin izzine izappe guyen iza zerethi biittiyo laatana mala Xoossi izas ccaqqides.
Izikka nu asa ba geene oothon metoothides. Buuro yelletida guutha naytti hayqqana malane yelliidayta kare kessi wora yeganamala wolliqathides.
Heraka Pixxrossayne Yesussa kaalliza hinkko issay kezzidi gede duhaaththaoy dizasoo bida.
Hessa gish Xoossa sinththanine asa sinththan sidhdhey bayndda hanoy tas daana mala wursio wode minnays.
Istti yeelachiza ba oothoza wolqama abba dambala gopontto mala copu hisitizaytako. Gird gida dhumay istta merinas naagizayssane coo mela waayetiza xoolinteta malako.
Ta asape ekabeykene asape tamara beyke. Yesuss Kiristossa tas qonccisides attiin.
Nagarancha medhetetha shenen nu diza wode hayqo ayfe nu ayfana mala wogay denththethida nagara amoy nu bolla oothides.
Takka hayssas miishshirachcho yootanas kiittetidade. Qasseka deretas tumu ammano assitamare gidada shuumistadis. Hessakka ta wordotontta tumu yootanassikko.
Iza azazota nagizayti wurii izan detes, izikka istan des. Izi nunan dizaysa nu izi nus imida ayanan eros.
Asi wurikka ba lage go7anaz gathi xeello attin bena go7anaz xalala koyopo.
Inte inte garisan dosetethan diite. Maniqotara isopetethan daanas koyte attin otoropitene ceeqetopite.
Camo yo wuriisi hanqoka, yilo, ooshu, cashe, qassekka hanko hara itateth wursi intefe digiite.
Xoossa qaala ta intes pacey baynida gaththana mala taas Xoossafe imettida hadara mala ta woossa keeththa oothancha gidadis.
Iza hu7eyne iza hu7e binanay qass boothu shachi milatiza bootha suufe malakko. Iza ayfetika tama laco milatetes.
Daro asa gakishe diza kiiyatethi Xoossa bonchosu galata bolla galata gujjana mala haysi wurikka intena go7anas hanides.
Ta ashsho mizzayne ta suththu uyzzay wuri tanan deeyana, takka izzaden deeyana.
Izaka zaarada “ee goodo neni duge ha allameza Kitteti Xoossa na gididaysa ta ammanays” gadus.
Isttika kittetidayta timmiritenn, isife qumma mussaninne wossan minnida.
Neni xiillotehta dosadasa. Makal7aka ixxasa. Hessa gishshi Xoossi ne Goday nena ne lagistape bolla kessides. Nena ufayssa zayte tiyides.
Yanssa ishsha Yaqoobe mashshan shuukissi wodhisides.
Coo mela duuna lalabetteththafe haakka. Hessa mala yoon waaxxettida asati Xoossafe haakki haakki beettes.
Be isha ixiza uray shempo wodhida asa. Shempo wodhidades medhina deyoy bayndaysa inte ereta.
Istti mii gigishshin Yesussay simmoona Phixxiroossa “Yoona na Simmoona! hayiti tana dosizayssafe aththa tana dossayii?” gides. Izikka “Ee ta Godo! ta nena dosizayssa nekka errasa” gides.
Issades hiillan hasa7ana eratethi imetees. Hara uras qass he ayananka eratetha qaalan hasa7ana qaalay imetees.
Istti nam77antho biza wode Yosefoy izi oonakkone bena ba ishatas qonccisides. Faroneykka Yosefo ishshata erides.
Geesha maxaafay giza mala “Deyon daana koyzayine lo7o gallasata beyanas koyiza uray ba duunape iitta hasa7ontta malane ba meterishatika gene hasa7ontta mala naageto.
Ammanizayti wurikka issi wozinaninne issi qoofan gaagi deetes. Istas dizay wursi issi bolla dees attin bess dizaz “haysi tas buzu7a mishsha” gizadey deena.
Tani taas ekkidayssane wursofe adhdhizayssa intes aatha imadis. Geesha maxaafati gizayssa mala Kiristoosay nu nagara gishshi hayqides.
“Izi giddon nabeta suuthi, geeshata suuthine biitta bolla asa kushen hayqidayta wursota suuthi beettides”
Ayhude gidoontta derey hassa siyidi daroo uhaaththaaetides. Goda qaalaskka boncho immidees. Medhdhina deyoos gigetida derey wuri ammanides.
Inte taape tamaridayssa woykko inte taape ekkidayssane siyidayssa woykko beyidayssa ay gidiko wursi oothite. Goday intenara gidana.
Gido attin iza inte isha mala hanqqite attin morkke mala xeellofite.
Kiristoosan xaphidazi gidontta asa woganine go7ay baynida ha alameza laafa wogan eqqida asa eratethanine coo mela baletho hasa7an intena oonikka di7ontta mala naagetite.
Xoossi tana Yesus kiristoosa baggara pude xeygida gishshi woyto gaka ekkanas elelayss.
Izikka nuna itetethafe wozanasinne loo7o oothanas miiniza ba dere bees doranas bena nus aathi iimides.
Ta intes tumma gays ta qaalla siyzadeesine tana kitidaden amanizades medhina deyooy dees, izadeey hayqoope gede deyoon pinnidees atin iza bolla pirdetena.
Hessa taas yootida Kiitanchazas he katamayone izi pengeta qasseka he ginbe lashaza izara wadhdhiza worqa zangey dees.
Istta wursieth dhayoko. Istta uloy istta Xoossuko. Isttas kawushatethay isttas bonchoko. Istta wozinay shempiday ha biitta duusankko.
Otoretethan puuridi Xala7ey kunddida pirdan izi kunddontta mala oorath ammanizade gidoopo.

Ta siiqoto nu issife attida atotetha gishshi ta intes xaafanas daro koyadisishin ha7i qasse nam77anthontta issito Xoossi asas immida ammano gishshi inte daro baaxxistana mala ta intena zorays. Ta intes xaafanas taas tooho gidides.
Yiidine kittetidayti asa tammarsizaysasiine Yesussa baggara beettida hayqqidayta denththa gish sabakkizaysas keehi hanqqeetida.
Izi nagaray doorettidi pude salo gakkides. Xoossika izi mooroza akekides.
Hessafe guye yesussay hathe Wayyne cajje oothida Gllilla derre garrsan dzza Qanna getittza ktama namantho bidees. He wode Qifrnahomen izas nay sakettida isi kawo shuumey dees.
Godas oothana ayanan xugetizayta gidite attin hessa he minotethafe guye gooppite.
Inte Yesus Kiristoosa ayfera beyontta aggikoka inte iza doosista. Ha7ika inte iza beyontta aggikoka iza ammaneta; Coo qaalan qonccisana danda7ontta gita boncho ufayss inte ufa7etista.
Izi nus ba ayana imida gish nu izan dizaysanne izikka nunan dizaysa nu hessan eros.

Heen gadan caala phanqqida ushshii kumii uttida issi xaarro malay dees. Hessa gish heen gadan dizayti he caala ushsha zanzza milatza sppoonjje gizaysara hisophphe giza miththa xeeran qaphidi iza dunako shishshida.
Izi nuna dhuman haaretethafe ashshidi gede ba dosiza naaza kawotethan nuna pinththides.
Ta ishato asa garisan shaaketeth medhizaytape inte tamarida timirtta ekkontta ixxon intes dhuphe gidiza asatape inte naagetite.
Oothi maadizadey oothi maado. Tamarisizadeyka tamariso.
“Inte he woode tape aykooka wosedeista ta intes tumu gayys ta sunththa ta awa wosiiko intes wursikka iimana.
He katamayssa garsa magala shuchchay duma duma al7o shuchchan lo7i giigides. Koyro magalezi Iyasiphide, nam7anthozi Sinpere, heedzdzanthozi Kelqedone, oydanthozi margide,
Hessa gish loo7o gidizayssa oothanas besizaysa erishe oothonttades nagara gidana.
Hessafe guye “Izas yayiza iza oothanchati wurka guuthatine gitati nu Goda galatite” giza qaalay algape kezides.
He wodey gakanas nu keeththa saloyssa mayanas nu lamoti naagoos.
Isi isi uray ba ootho berika pacci xelo. Hesafe guye hara urara bena ginasonta diisheizi bena ceqisizaz demana.
Issadey ba oychida gela7oyo wogara oykontta aggiko izi wodeyka ciimi ciimi bikko ekkana koyko ba koyda mala ekko. Ekikone geliko lo7okko. Nagara gidena.
Isttii intena ba keethape goodana, haray attoshshin intena wodhizadeey wuri xoossas ooththzade milatza wodey yana.
Tani hara wolqama malata salo bolla beyadis. Xoossa hanqoy isttan polistanas wuriseth gidida laapun bochata oykida laapun kiitanchata beyadis.
Yesussayka zaaridi “Ta iitta hasa7ida gidiko anne ta gooysa ne markkata; ta yootday likee gidiko tana aazas baqqaz?” gides.

Ero neon, tanara issife ammanetida oothanchazo, mishiracho qaala yootos tanarane Qalamenxxosara qasseka istta sunththay deyo maxaafen xaafetida hanko tanara ootho lagistara issife waayidayta he macashata ne maadana mala ta nena woossays.
Asay kase ammanizaytane nabeta suuthu gusida gishshi ne istta suuthu ushshadasa. Hessika isttas besses”
Mulekka gidenna. Nuni nagaras hayqidosu. Histin hayssafe guye nu waani nagaran daanee?
Usupuntho kawozi kase dizade shin ha7i qass bayinda do7akko. Izi laapunatape issakko. Izika gede dayo so baana.
Gido attiin maxxafay qasse ay gize? “Ayleyo izi nazaragathi diiga ayley nay goqaynara latina” ges.
Dure gidanas koyizayti gidikko gede paacceninne narxxan gelidi oykettizayssa mala daro hadanine iita amon un7etetes.
He do7azine ne beyida tammu kaceti he laymma maccashayo ixxettes. Istti izo dhayo so gathana, kallo mela ashshana, istti izi asho maanane izo tamanka xuuggana.
Xoossu siqiza uray gidiko izi Xoossa achan erettida de.
Histinni nu aazi ginoo? Nuni isttafe adhizonii? Mulekka adhoko. Ayhudata gidikkoka hanikko dere asa gidikokka wurikka nagarape garisa baggara diza gish ta wursikka kassistada isttas yootadis.
He wode mara miisile meedhdhidi eqqas yarsho shishida. Berkka medhida ba kuushe oothon uhaaththaa7ettidane guppiida.

Hayta ha bochatan hayqope attida asa zereththati kase ba oothida iitta oothope simmidi maarotethan gelibeyttena. Daydanthas worqapene birape, xariqimalape, shuchafene, miththafe, oothettida xeelanas woykko haythen siyanas woykko hamuttanas danda7ontta eeqatas goyno aggibeyttena.

Hessa gishshi Godas babo guusi ay gusakone nu eriza gishshi asay nu yotizaysa ero gi ekana mala oothanas daburosu. Nuni onanttakone Xoossa achan qoncceko. Qasseka inte wozinanka qoncce gididaysa ta ammanays.
Haysafe kasse nuni nu asho amoteth polishe ashoy koyiza oge kallishe istara doos. Nuunikka hankko asa mala nu medhetethappe Xoossa hanqo garsan dookko shin,
Hara daroo qaalara isttas markkatishe “hayssa geella yeletethafe intena ashshite” gidi istta qofisides.
Asho shene mala deyzayssa gidiko inte hayqanane asho ootho iittaza inte ayanan wodhi gidiko inte deyon daana.
Geesha maxaafay giza mala “Izan ammanizay wurikka yellatena.”
Inte ammanoy alame kumethan siyettida gishshine inte gishshi ta Godaa Xoossa, Yesus Kiristoosa baggara galatays.
Xoossan dosettida nu ishato izi intena doordayssa nu eroosu.
Siiqoy daro nagara kammiza gishshi harape bollara inte inte garisan lo7ethi siiqettite.
Nuni Xaallane dere markkaben baana mala geeteti qachchetida gish Phawulossane hara qachcho asatakka kawoo Awugisxxossa ola wotadarata gidoofe gidida Yulliyossa geetettiza xeetu halaqas aththi immida.
Xoossa othancha mule yethine dorisaza yeth hizgi yexxida “Wurisa danda7iza Goda Xoosso! ne oothoy gitane malalithizazikko, dere kawozo! ne ogey likenne tumukko.
Ha7i yelettida guutha nayti maath amotizayssa mala inteka attanas izan dicci dicci baanas geeshi gidida ayana timirtte laamotite.
Tani salope hizgiza qaala siyadis “Hayssa guye Goda Yesusayta gididi hayqanayti istti anjjetidaytakko!” xiillo ayanayka “Ee, istti ba daburisafe shempana mala istta oothoy istta kaallana” gees.
Xoossa Aawa sinthan iittatethi baynda loo7o ammanoy; “Aayanne Aaway hayqqida nayta, istta azinati hayqqida maccashata metotetishin maadonne hayssa alameza tunatethafe bena nagokko.
Oonika intena duunan mal7eththon balethontta mala ta intes yootayss.

Salonka biitta bollaka, biittafe garisanka, abba giddon diza medhetetha wurison “Alga bolla uttidayssasine dorisas galatayne dhoqateth, bonchoyne wolqay medhinape medhina gakkanaas izas gido!” gishin ta siyadis.
Nam7antho kiitanchayka ba zayeza punnides. Issi gita zuma milatiza miishi exishe duge abba giddo yegettides. Abbas cigoy suuthu giddies.
Isxxifanose oykkidi katamappe gede kare hallida. Shuchan cach oykkida. Hesi wuri hannishin marikkatikka ba mayo Sawulle gettetiza pantha achchan wothida.
Nam7nithoka Zaniko derey inte wurikka Goda galatite derey wuri iza sabiite” ges.
Wurikka izape, izain, izasko. Izas bonichoy medhinape medhinas gido. Amini7i.
“Wonteththa glass Yanissay Yasussay beeko yishshin beydi <deree nagara biitappe digana Xoossa doorssay hekko hysichchi!
Layiman aqiza Raba7a dere xomosana yidayta saron mokki ekkida gishshi hanko azazetontta asara dhayontta ammanon attadus.
Kaysooy kaysootana wodhanasine dhaysanas xaala yees, ta gidiko intes deyooy dana malane intes kehi darana mala yadsi.
Nu derey gidiko salonkko. Heepe buro yaanayssa nuna ashida Goda Yesus kiristoosa yuusa laamotethan naagon doosu.
Hessa gish Xoosu galatanasi inte Kiristossa ekidamala isi isaka ekite.

Ne istta nenara ekkada isttara gidada nena geshsha asati ba huee meyidistana malane Xoossa keeththan immetiza muxxata mishsha ne isttas qanxxa, ne hessaththo ooththikko ne bolla worettidaysi wuri mela gididayssane nekka musse woga polla nagizade gididayssa asay wuri errana.
Izi qaxaretidaytaskka Aawa qaxaretidaytas xalala gidontta nu Aawa Abiramey kasse qaxaristanape sinithe izas diza ammano geedo kallizaytas wurisossa.
Hessafe exxa yeggin exxay Maatiyassas keezides. Izikka taammane issi hawaristara isife tayibeetides.
Isttas istta bolla oothoy atto geetetidaytine istta nagaray maretidayt anijjetidayta.
Heyti biitta goda sinthan eqqiza nam7u woyra miththatan istta bolla Xompe wothiza nam7u ballatakko.
Darsi qoppite; muyagiite; yekiite. Inte michay yehon; ufaysay qasse qadhetethan siimo.
Ta ishazo, loo7ota milata attiin ita asata milatopa. Loo7o oothizadey wurikka Xoossa asa. Ita oothizadey qasse Xooss beybeyna.
Izi kasse qaxaristanape kasse demmida xiillotethay qaxarisi malata gidida heskka xiillotethas matame ekides. Hessa gish qaxaretontta ammanizaytas xiillotethi paydistana mala wurisotasi izi Aawa.
Gaasoykka hayqida asi nagarape shemipidis.
Yesusa deyoy nu asatethan qoncana mala nuni iza hayqo wurso wode tooki yuyosu.
Haray wurikka Yesus kiristoosayssa gidontta ba go7as woxxizade xalalako
Abirames wode gede bidade gidikkoka Saarayka yelontta makara gidikkoka ufayss isttas immidadey ammanettidade hisiti xellida ammanon na Aawa gidanas gakides.
Tana kitidadeey sheene tas immidaytape issadeeka dhaysontta wurisetha gaalas ta denththana.

Hai qasse Ximotoossay inte achchafe nukko yidi inte ammano gishshine inte siiqotetha gish loo7o wore nuna sissidees. Qasseka inte wursso wode nuna looethi qooppizayssane nukka intena beyanas laamotiza mala inteka nuna beyanas laamotizayssa nuus yootides.
Inte hessaththo oothikko hanikko wanna heemmizayss qooncciza wode inte mooretontta boncho akilile ekkanayysako.
Hessa gishshi hessa mala ufaysi nuus diza gishshi nuni xalatethan hasa7os.

Heyti wordo asttamareti qass bess erettontta ixida miishe wursi cashe chayettes. Heytanttii woxumayden oykettanasine hayqqanas yellettida. Coo mela ba shenen dizaytane qofay bayinda do7ata malakko. Do7ati coo mela dhayzayssatho isttika mulera dhayana.
Izi hessa giday mishsha shishshza karaxxte oykkzadey iza gididda gish shiqqza mishshafe bees shishshdi goetzadee gidida gishasa, attin manqqotas michchetdii gidena.
Hesa gish, Xoossi nuna siqiza siqo nu eros. Nu iza siqqon amanetos. Xossi siqqo. Siqon diza uray Xoossan dees. Xoosikka he uran dees.
Isxxifanose bolla denddida godeetha gaason laaletida ammaniza asay qaala Ayhudatas xalala yootishe Finqqe, Qophirosanne Anxxokiiya gizasoo gakkanaas kanththi bida.
Gido attin tumu ayyana asi gideth nuus dizayssan woppu giidi duussara gita wodheko.
Izi geeshata olana malane xoonana mala izas godatethi imettides. Duma duma qomotane zarikkista, duma duma qaalan hasa7iza dereta wuriso bolla izas godatethi imettides.
Inte iitta oothida gishshi qaxayettishe danda7iko intes aaza galatay deyanee? Inte lo7o oothidi waaye ekkishe danda7iko inte Xoossafe galata ekkandista.

Hessa gishshi xeygetidayti isttas immana geetetida medhina biitta ekkana mala kiristoosay oratha caaqo cimattizade gidides. Koyro caaqoza garisan diza wode istti oothida nagarape geeyana mala istta gishshi izi hayqides.
Histin nu ay giinoo? Xoossa kiyatethi darana mala nagara gujji othinoo?
Inte galata galatizayta gidite attin asse yelachiza lafa hasa7ay co eyatetha yoy intes besontaa gish hessamalay inte garisan doppo.

Qasseka Cololo parazo beyadis. Parazoza togidayssa sunthi hayqo geetetes. Iza qass dufoy kaalles. Hayqoyne dufoy biittafe sayso olan, gafun, bochanine bazzo do7an wodhana mala godatethi isttas imettides.

Hessa gishshi ufaysi ammanon yides. Hessikka iza ufaysay iza kiiyatethan gidanadanine Abirame zerethasi wurisosi ammanetizayssa gidana mala hanides. Hesikka wogan izayta gididaytas xalala gidontta ammanon Abirame nayta gididaytas wurisotaskko. Izikka nuus wurisoskka Aawako.
Rome asati tana qori oychchidappe guye tana hayqos gaththiza mishshe demmontta aggida gish birshi yeedana koyida.
Hessa gish hesikka assi koyda mala gidontta woykko asa daburan gidontta Xoossa maarida mala hanees.
Istta garisafe issi issi asati laymmatidi issi gallas nam7u tammane hedzdzu shi asay dippi gi wuroyssatho wurontta mala nuka ane laymmatoko.
Gido attin ta asatetha gidon oothiza nagara wogay tana qachi oykidi ta qofa wogara oletiza hara wogay ta asatetha gidon oothishin beyays.
Hessa gishshi koyrope kiristoosa gishshi immetida timirtteza aggidi ane gede mino timirtteko boosu. Hayqida oothope maarotethan gelo gishshine Xoossan ammano gishshi buro ane izan wodhdhi maadhokko.
Hessa gishshi oonka iza kadhopo. Izi taako saron simmana mala inte maddiite. Nuka hara amanizaytara iza yuusa naagon doosu.
Ta ishato issi uray taas ammanoy dees gikko qasse oothon besontade gidikko iza ay maadanee? Hesamala amanoy iza ashane?
Yerusalame asape issi issi asat hizzgda “istt woodhana koyza addezii hayssa gideene?”
Hessa gi simmidi istta bolla uuhaaththau gidi “inte Xiiloo Ayana ekkite.
Xooss asi xiillisiza oge erontta aggidi ba xiillotethas oge kaallida attin Xoossa xiillotetha oge kaallibeyttena.
Xoossa naan amanizade wurisso wozinan iza gish markay dees. Xoosu amanontay wurikka Xoossi benaza gish immida markatetha amanonta gish iza wordoses.
Ta intes tummu gays, tana ammanizadey ta ooththiza ooso oththana, hessafeka aththana, gasooyka tani aawako bana.
Ayleti azanka ba Godatas haristanamalanne ufaysanamala qasekka awute zarontamala tamarisa.
Intefe issadeskka Xoossa kiyatethi paccontta mala qasseka camo ayfe ayfiza mithi mokkidi meto medhontta malane darota moorontta mala naagetite.
Qassekka iza sunththi boretontta malanne xala7e yarden izi gelontta mala ammanontta asa achchan loo7o markkateth daanas koshshes.
Gidikoka Kiristossay imana gi qachida mala nusu isas issas duma duma imotethi imetides.
Nam7antho kiitanchzi qass xu7aza abba bolla gusides. Abayka hayqida asa suutha mala giddies. Abba giddon shempora dizayti wurikka hayqida.
Co asa ayfen bistanamalane oothisizaytappe duna anjjo ekanas gidonita inte Kiristossa aylleista mala Xoossa shene kumetha wozinape polanamala wozinape azazetite.

Inte isttas immana malthey qass ashiketethanine bonchon gido. Inte Kiristoosayta gidida gishshi intes diza lo7o amaleza gishshi iitta hasa7iza asay ba iitta hasa7an yeellatana mala intes lo7o qopay deyo.
Ee ta sheeney naza beydii iza ammanizadeey wuri medhina deyoo demmanasiko, tanikka wuriseththa gaalas iza hayqqope denththana.”
Xoossas boncho immontta aggida gish goda kitanchay herakka herodossa shoci yeggiin guxxuni hayqqidees.
Maariza Aawasine wursika mintthethiza nu Goda Yesus Kiristoossa Aawas Xoossas galatay gido.
Issi issi asay haytape pooqqeti eqqidi go7ay bayndda yootakko simmides.
Aammanizayti wuri attana mala Xoossa woliqa gidida gishshi ta mishshiracho qaalan yeelattike; Hesika koyro ayhudatas kallidi hanko dere asaskko.
Gaasoyka keethay keexxeteth oykettidape guye hara wothi qass keexxana danda7iza uray oonka baawa. Hessika keethas koyroy Yesus Kiristoosakko.
Gidikkoka intefe isi issadey ba machcho bena siqqiza mala siqqo machchaka ba azina bonchu.
Inte kase inte mooronine inte asho nagara hanotetha intefe digontta aggida gishshi hayiqidaytako shin Xoossi intena kiristoosa baggara pathides. Inte nagaraka wurs atto gides.
Cimati ne bolla ba kushe woththi woosishin, sinththafe hananayssi nees immettida imotetha lep histta aggoofa.
Hessafe guye tani ooratha salone ooratha biitta beyadis. Kase saloyne kase biittay aadhi bida. Hayssafe guye abayka deena.
Wuri wode ufaettite.
He gallasatan asay hayqana koyana shin hayqo demmetena. Hayqanas amottana shin hayqoy isttafe bistana.
Yesussay hayqqidi denddidayssa nu ammaniza gidiiko Yesussa ammanidayta Xoossi yesussara hessathoka zaari ha yeedana.
Yesussay Xoossa na gididaysa amanidi marikatiza wurson Xoossi deesinne, izadeykka Xoossan dees.
Inte kasse diza dussay balethiza amon qitida gise kase ceega asatetha intefe intefe qariyogana tamaridista.
Pengeey tana ta, ta bagara gelizadey wuri attana, gelanane kezana hemmetizasoka demmana.
Shuchan cadettida magazenka nam77u kezi phaliqetida. Mashan shuketi hayqida waayetishe, Goodetishene daaburshe dorisa ittene deyshe itte mayidi waayetida.
Izi xiillo gididaysa inte eriza gidiko xiillo oothizay wuri izape yelletidaysa inte ereta.

Gido attin geemara haniza yeelasiza yoota nu aggidos. Asi balethoko; Xoossa qaala woridora walakokko. Hessa histanape tumu yoota qoncera yootishe asi wurikka nu gizayssa ekana mala nunatetha Xoossa sintthe shiishos.
Hessa gish izi Xoossa ushshachchan dhoqqu dhoqqu giddape guye xiillo Ayana uhaaththaayssa ba aawappe ekkidi ha7i inte beeyzayssane siyzayssa duge guussides.
Bena medhidayssa milatana mala eran ooraxida ooratha asateth mayidista.
Yesussay hessa siyd ha sakoy xoossa nay izan bonchetana malane Xoossi bonchetanasafe attin iza hayqqos gaththizaz dena” gides.
“Xilloy Xoossa ammanon deyees” geetetidi kase xaafetida mala Xoossa xiilloteth mishshiracho qaalan qonccina; He xiillotethay koyrope wurisetha gakanaas ammanon hanana.
Hessafe guye Yesussay ba kaqqistana masqqaleza tookidii “Asa hu7ee guuge” geetettizaso kezides. He sooy Ayhudata qaalara “Golggoota” geetetes.
Nuusi immetida imota mala dumma dumma imotethi dees. Isades burope hananazi yooto gidiko izades immetida ammano mala yooto.
Koyro do7azi gaamo milatess. Nam7anthozi qass boora milatess. Hedzdzanthoza ayfesoy asa ayfeso milatess. oydanthozi qass piradhdhiza golle kafo milatess.
Hesa gish eratethi bayndayta mala gidonta inte wanidi erata mala danakone nagetite.
Ayhudata gidonine hiniko dere asa gidon dumatethi dena. Issi Goday wurisosikka Godakko. Iza wossizayta gujj anjes.
Amaniza asa wursi xillisanas Kiristoosay woga wuris polides.
Haniza yoon wursion galatarn, woossanine gaanatethan Xoossa sinththi shiiqite attin ay mishanka hirigofite.
Istti iitta miish amotidayssatho nuka amotontta mala he istta hanoy nu naagistana mala nuusu lemuso gidides.
Izika he ciimma ollaza doyidees. He ciimma ollafe wolqama tama cuwa mala cuway kezidees. He ollafe kezida cuwaza geedon awa arisheyne saloy dhumida.
Hessa malan oonikka balettidi ba isha balethofo; Gasooykka hayssafe kase nu intes yootida malane nagistana mala akekissida mala Goday heyitantta mala nagara oothiza wurssota bolla ba hanqqo ehana.
Hessa gishshi oonikka Kiristoosa bagga gidiko izi ooratha medhetethiko. kase ceega medhetethay aadhides. He iza oolla hara ooratha medhetetthi gelides.
Gasoyka Aaway naaza doses ba othzaysakka wursi iza besees, inte malaletontta mala hayssafeka adhiza ootho buro bessana.
Kasse kaysotizadey hayssafe guye kaysotpo. Gido atiin metotetidi iza wosizaytas imizay iza kushen deyana mala loo7o miish ba kushera oothi demanas daburo.
Xoossi inte wossa siydi ta inteko yanadan oothana mala taas ufayssi diza gish ta baada intekon shempanaso taas hayana giigissa.
Dumma dumma imatha timirtte ekopite. Nu wozinay minni eqqizay Xoossa kiyatesan attin kaththa woga naagon gidena. Hessa he woga naagizaytaka izan go7etbeytena.
Histtiko ta ishato inte garssan miinni oothizayta Godan intefe bollara diza halaqatane intena zorizayta inte bonchana mala nu intena woosos.
Iza yellidayt hessaththo giday oonnika Yesussa izi Kristtossa giidi markkatday wuri ayhudata woosafe godistana mala Ayhudati kase seera oththida gish ayhudatas babidi gida.
Tumu qaxxaaretidaytine Xoossu woossizayti Yesus kiristoosan ceeqizaytine ashon ceeqetontayti ashonika ammanetonttayti nunako.
Iza azazoykka nu iza naza Yesus Kirstosa amananasinne izi nuna azazidamala nuni nu garsan dosistana malako.
Qasseka hara do7ay biittafe kezishin beyadis. Izas qass dorisa kace mala nam7u kacey dees. Izi dawetho hasa7es.
Ta ishato inte inte qofan guutha nayta mala gidopite. Iitta oothos gidiko guutha nayta mala gidite. Qofan gidiko kaha kunthida asata gidite.
Inte garisan metotiza uray dizee? Diza gidiko izi wosso. Ufa7etizadey dizee? diza gidiko ufayssa yeethi yeexxo.
Hessa gishshsi daaburida inte qesene inte gulibate minisite.
Oonaka duuma shaaki maadontta issa issas izade ootho mala piridiza Xoossa “Izi nu Aawakko” giidi inte xeeygizazi gidiko hayssa alamezan inte imathene bete asi gidi diza wode wurson izas babbite.
Inte Xoossa dhene polidi izi intes immida ufayssa qaala ekanas minni eqanas intena koshes.
Ammano geethi issi miishe hanana giidi nu sidhontta dishe beyontta miisheka beyida mal aero gi ekkoko.
Hanko amanonta asamala coo mela qohaaththaan mela siimeristanas intes besena gada ta intena zorays.
Hessa gishshi muusan woykko ushan ba7ale bonchon woykko agina xeeronine sambata gallas boncho gishshi inte bolla oonikka piridofo.
Hessa gishshi Xoossa alga sinthan de7idi qamane gallas iza keeththan izas oothettes. Alga bolla uttidayssika isttas dussasokk.
Gido attin Phawulossay duge wodhdhidi naza bolla hokkidi iddimmidine “hayqqibeyna paxxa dees, daggammopite!” gides.
Hessa gish kiristtoossa baggara diza atottethinne medhdhina boncho deemmana doorettidayta gish gaada wurssakka dandda7adis.
Ammano siiqotethan inte issay issa yeeri ekkidi saroketite. Intes kiristoosaytas wursos saroy gido.
Inte Kiristossas imiiza boncho yashara issay issas azazetite.
Ta ishato! inte qass hessa kasetidi erida gishshi hanko makal7ata bala geedon goocheti biid kase inte minni dizasope kundontta mala naagettite.
Macheto Goda achchan intes bessiza miishi gidida gishshi inte azinatas azazetite.
Harati beeydi naagistana mala nagara oothizayta asa wursso sinththan hanqqa.
Hessa gish nuni nu garisan isay isa bolla piridanape ane naagetos. Hesa aggidi nu ishas dhuphe gidizayssa woykko iza oykiza narxxa wothontta mala ane nu naagetos.
Gidikkoka lo7o oothizades oonasika Ayhuda asas gidin hankko dere asas sabay, sarotethinne bonchoy gidana.
Tama woliqa toyssida qaara maccashafe kessi ekki attida. Daaburape minnida. Olason goobata gidida allaga asa ola goodida.
Tani Yesussa malata ta asatethan tokadis hessa gish hi7a tana oonikka waysena.

Hessafe guye issi mino kiitanchay wolqama woxa shuchu milatiza issi shuchu denthidi hizgishe duge abba giddo yeggides “Gita katamaya Baabilona hessathoka wolqara sugettada kundana. Hayssafe guye muleka beettuku.
Ta ishato, inte qasse wurisofe bollara inte geesha ammanon minni eqqite. Xiillo ayananka minni woossite.
Loo7o ufaysizazine kumeth gididazi Xoossa sheney azakone inte paaci erana mala inte qofan oraxidi lamettite attin hayssa alame asa milatopite.
Haysa alameza woykko ha alamezan diza ay mishekka dosopite; Oonika ha alameza dosiiko Aawa siqoy izade achchan deena.

Hessa gishshi neno hara bolla piridizayso neni ta hanni geedon oothadisi gaada gaasoy neesi deena. Ne hara ura bolla piiridizayssan nerika nees kunane ekkaasa. Gaasoykka hara ura bolla ne piridizaysa neka zaarada iza oothiza gishaskko.
Wana tusamala gidida Phesxirosane Yansaykka tas imetida Xoossa imo akekidi tasne ista qasse Ayhudatas qasla yotanas qaala gagidos.

Wootadarati Yesussa kaqqidape guye iza mayooza ekkidi wotadarata issa issa gakana mala oydu kessi shakereththida. Garsara mayiza mayozaka hessaththo shakereththida. Ggido attin garsara mayza mayoz siketoontta pudepe duge gakkanaas coo yeda dees.
Histiko neni harata tamariso agada ne hu7es aazas tamarikii? Ne hara ura kaysottopa ga sabakashe neesi kaysotazii?
Inte asatethay inte gaathan diza xiillo ayanas duussaso gididayssa inte erekketii? He ayanayka inte Xoossafe ekoyssakko. Inteka inte intes gidekista.
Kirstoosay wursos issi to hayqoysane haray wurikka izara issife hayqidaysa nu erida gishshi Kirstoosa siiqoy nuna woliqara oothises.
Hessa gishshi salope xeyisi intena gakin ammaniza nu ishato nu ammanos hawarene qessista halaqa Yesusa qopite.

<Ha ekkizadefe gede immizadey anjjetidade> giza Goda Yesussa qaala nu yushi qopidi nurkka nu nu kushera ooththi demmidi hara dabburanchata gede maaddana nus bessizayssa ta intena daroo duuma duuma oggera beesadis.
Ekoy geloy wuriso asa achchan boncheto. Inte hithey geesh gido. Gaasoyka layma amoy dizaytane laymatizayta bolla Xoossi piridana.
Dufooza hookii xeelidi ahay xaxxetida mayoo xala dizayssa beeydes. Gido attin gede dufoo giido gellibeeyna.
wolqanthine dada giirethine gugunthi, gita biitta qaathey hanides. Asi biitta bolla medhettosope hanno gakkans hessa malay biitta bolla hani7erena.

Taka he kiitanchazas goynanas iza too bolla ta liiphon gufanadis shin izi tana “aaga! hessaththo oothofa! taka nenara Yesus Kirstoosa markateth oykida Ishatara issife oothizadeko; Neni Xoossas goynna! Yesusa markay tinbite ayanakko” gides.
Xoossi gidiko hessa ba ayana baggara nuusu qonccisides. Ayanayka Xoossas ciima yoo ashontta wursi piligi xeeles.
Inte iza keeh ufayssan mokki ekkite. Iza mala asataka bonchite.
Nayto, inte Goda ufayssana mala inte intena yelidaytas wurso miishan azazetite.

Histiko nu ceqeteth hayssa malako. Ha alamezan harapeka intesara nusara diza gaytotethan, Xoossafe gidida geeshatethaninne suretethan nu deydayssa nu wozinay nuusu markatees. Hessika asa cinccatethan giddontta Xoossa kiiyatethanko.
Ta azazoo ekkidi ooththiza urray tana dosees, tana dosiizadeka ta aaway dooses, taka iza dosana, tanaka izades qoonccisana.

Ha azazoti berika beepe medhdhi ekkida goyno qofay coo bessontta ashiketethine ba asateth naaqi oykethan isttas tumu erateth dizayta milatetes. Gido attin asho amoteth shiishi oykiza woliqay isttas baawa.
Ne bolla ay mala siiqqoy dizakone isti ne gish wosa keeththa asa sinthan marikatida. Isti biiza oogen Xooss ufaysiza hanon ne ista madikko loo7o oothassa.
Go7ayine birshechi bayindda paalammape haakka. Ayss giikko hessantta malay ooshshu kaalleththizayssa ne eraassa.
Nunika Goda boncho mastote mala xoliqetishe iza milatanasi ha bonchofe gede hara bonchon lamistana. Hessikka ayana gidida Godapekko.
Medhina ayanan bena wothoy baynda yarsho oothi Xoossas shiishida kiristoosa suuthi nuni deyo Xoossas goynanas hayqetha oothope nuna ay mala aaththi geeshandee?
Hessa gish nuni Goda Yesus Kirsttossa ammanishin nusi immida Xiillo Ayana Xoossi isttas immiko histtin Xoossara eqqistanas ta oonne?”
Inte atana galasas atametida Xoossa Xillo ayana michisopite.

Hessa gishshi neni ay mala timirtte ekkidakone ne siyosayssa yuusha qopane naaga. maarotethanka gela; Neni beegontta aggiko qass ta kayso mala ne qopotta duxu gaana. Ta ay saaten neeko yanakone ne eraka.
Ta nayto Intena oonikka balethontamala nagetite. Izi xiillo gidida mala xiilo oothizadeyka xiilokko.
Ta ishato ayana wursi amanopite. Gido attiin ayanati Xoossapekonne pacci beyte. Gasoykka daro wordo nabeti biitta bolla laletida.
Hessa gish ta ishshato nagaras marooteethi bettizay Yesussa baggara gididayss intes sabbaketidayssa errite.
Ta ishato hayssafe hara ta intena gizay Godan ufa7etite. Ha7ika zaarada izo ta intes xaafiko tana salethena. Intenaka go7ana.
Inte shiiqiza shiiqoy pirdas gidontta mala intafe oonka gafidadey diiko kasetidi ba son mo. Hankko attidayssa hara wode inteko baada woga woththana
Philaxossayka “Inte iza ekki bidi inte woga mala pirditee” gidees. Ayhudata aysizayti qasse zaaridi “Nu ass wodhana mala nuus fiqadey immetibeyna” gides
Gido attin inte wurikka wursofe adhdhiza imoteth lo7ethi koyte. Qasseka hara wursofe adhdhiza oge ta intena bessana.
Hessa gishshi nuusi koshshsiza qeessista halaqay hessa mala geeshine wothoy iza bolla baynda xiillone nagaranchatape shaaketidi salotape bollara bonchetida qessata halaqako.
Taas woliqa immiza kiristoosa tani wuriso miishe oothanas danda7ayss.
Xoossa sheney inte laymmafe hakkidi dummatanaskko.
Beegidi galatara gathi pacey bayinda Xoossa woossite.
Musey hessa siyidda mala Midiyame biitta beettidi hen bete ass gidi deyyides. Heenkka nam77u atuma na yeellides.
Addey ba hu7e gulunttanas bessena. Atumasi Xoossa lemusone Xoossa bonchokko. Maccashi gidiko addes bonchokko.
Inte wurikka issi asho gididi sarotethas xeeygetida kiristoosa saroteth inte wozinan kawoto. Inte galatizayta gidite.
Hanzay wurikka izape izas medhetida Xoossi daro nayta bonchoso efanas istta marotethas hu7e gidida Yesusay waayen polanas koshizazi giddies.
Inte garsan diza oolaynne ooshay awape yidee? Inte wozinan diza amotethafe dendida oola gidenee?
Inte garisan yeelachiza laymmay dizaysi woretees. Hessa mala tunatethi ammanontta dereta achanka deena. Be Aawa machcho ekkida asi intekon dees.

Asa bolla gakida paccepe hara aadhiza paccey inte bolla gakibeyna. Xoossi ammanetiza Xoossu gidida gishshi inte danda7ontta inte wolqafe bollara inte paccetena mala agagena. Gido attin inte paccetiza wode he pacceza inte danda7ana mala wolqa immidi paccepe inte kesi ekkana oge izi intes giigisana.
Ta bidape guye Xoossa dorssatas michchetontta iita asati inte garss gellanayssa ta errayis.
Hessa gish inte bolla gakkida goodetethanine meto wursson inte miinnida gish nu nu baggara inte danddao giishshane inte ammano gish ammaniza asa wursso achchan ceeqetoos.
Xoosu be7ida uray oonikka deena. Nu nu garsan siqetiza gidiko Xoosi nunan dana. Iza siqoyka nuna pollistana.
Assi xeygidaden asi Kiitidade gidonta Yesuss Kiristossa hayqope denthida iza aawa Xoossafe kiititda Phawulossape.
Histinko inte daaburidi ufayssi qanxxontta mala hessathoka nagaranchatape kase iza bolla gakida hessa mala eqetethi danda7ida Yesusa qopite.
Nuni hessa mala hayqon izara isife gidikko qasse denithanka izara isife gidosu.
Qasse “Haniko dere asato inteka iza deretara ufa7etite” ges
Wode wurssetha bolla issi issi asay ammano aggidi baalethiza ayanatane iita ayana timirtte kaallanayssa xiillo ayanay qonccera yootes.
Assay dere aysizaytas haristanamalane loo7o gidida miish wursi oothanas giga gidanamala asa qofissa.
Heyti he asati kase daro wodepe kase saloy Xoossa qaalan medhetoyssane biittayka haathafene haathan dizayssa erishe kaadetes.

Kiristoosayka nuna Xoossako shiishanas izi ba hu7es xiillokko shin hanko xiillo gidontta nu nagara gishshi nam7anthettontta mala issi to waayettidi hayqides. Izi ashon hayqides shin ayanan qass paxides.
Istti xiillotetha oge shaaki eridape guye isttas imettida geesha azazozape guye simmanape istti kase he xiillotetha ogeza erontta aggidakko isttas lo7oko shin.
Ta ishato ootho othantta asapene inte nuupe ekkida timirtteza mala doontta ammanizaytape inte haakkana mala Goda Yesuss Kiristtoossa sunththan intena nu azazoos.

Hessa gishshi nagaray issade geedon duge ha alameza yida mala hayqoykka nagara geedon yides. Hayqoykka hessa baggara asa wurisoko yides. hessas gaasoy asi wurikka iza baggara nagara oothida gishshikko.
Heytantti ammanon kawota xonnida suure pirida piridida bees imettida ufayssa qaala ekida gaamota duuna goridida.
Nu goodetikoka wora wodhi attoko. Istti nuna shoci gendersikoka nu dhayoko.
Inteno laymatizayto alamera siiqetethi Xoossara morketeth gididaysa ereketii? Hessa gish hayssa alamezara siiqitethi koyzay wurikka Xoossas morke.
Phawuloossayne izara diza zatatti qaalla isiyan sabakoontta mala xiillo ayanay digida gish pirigiyarane galatiya derera adhdhi bida.
Ammanon bettiza xillotethi qase hiziges “Ne wozinara pud sallo oonee baanayii? gopa” hesstho gussi Kiristoosa sallope duge ha wothana gussukko.
koyro kiitanchazi biidi xu7aza biitta bolla gusides. Do7aza malatay istta bollane he do7aza misiles goynizayta bolla iittane waayisiza madunthi istta bolla kezides.

He Xoossa maxaafaza ekkida mala oyddu do7atine nam7u tammane oyddu cimati he dorisa sinthan ba liiphon gufannida. Isttika issadey ba kushen diitha mala miishi oykidida. Hessaththoka geeshata woossa gidida izan exaney kumida worqa xaaro ba kushen oykki dettes.
Yesussay izi Kirstossa gididaysa amanizay wuri Xoossafe yelettidas. Aawa dosizay wuri nazaka izatho doses.
Ane nuni nu garisan isay isara mindi letizaysane qanatetishe mela hada ceeqetoko.
Cima asa ne Aawa mala bonchora zora attin doomm7ofa; naatetha attuma nayta ne ishata mala xeella.

Oone erizay “Intena istti iittaa oothetes” giidi asay intena zigirikoka Xoossi nuna beyanas yiza gallas hanko dere asay inte oothoy lo7o gididayssa beyidi Xoossu galatana mala inte isttara diza wode inte amaley lo7o gido.
Muse wogas zili7etizayssa gidiko tra kase woossa keeththa goodizadeko. Woga naagon beetiza xiillotethi gidiko kase ta bolla issi wothoyka deena.
Shumezika nazi ay saten paxxidakoone issta zari oychchides. isstikka izazs “qama gllasappe Lapuun Saten iza michchizayssi agides” gida.

Hessafe guye Ayhudata danati kaqqetida asata meeqqethth wodirape menththidi istt iza masqqsale bollafe woththana mala Philaxxossa wossiida. Istti hessa ooththiday Ayhudati sambbatas gigetiza gaalas gidida gishshine he sambbatayka daroo giita ba77ale gidida gish sambbata gaalas ahay masqqale bolla gami77ontta malla koyida gishasa.

Philaxxossay hessa Yesussa hassa7e siydapee guye iza birshi yedana koyides shin Ayudatas babida gish istti “ne hayssa addeza birshiko Rome kawoo qeessare bagga gidaka, gasooyka bena berkka kawooththizadey wuri Qeessares moorkke” gishe wurikka wasiida.
Kaalleththdka Yesussay hizzgdes “inte wozinay metotetoofo Xoossu ammanitee, tanaka ammanite.
Ay ogeraka intenara eqetizaytas hirigopite. Hessi istti dhayanasine inte atanayssas Xoossafe imettida malatako.
Ta intena doradiis attin inte tana doribeykista, inte bidi daroo ayfee ayfana mala inte ayfeey eeqi dana mala ta intena wothadis, hessa gish inte ta sunththan woosidaysa wursi aaway intes immana.
Abeeley Xoossas, Qayele yarshofe adhiza yarsho ammanon shiishides. Xoossi iza yarshoza gishshi hasa7ishe izi ammanon geeshi gididayssa marikattides. Izi hayqqinkka iza ammanoy ha7i gakanas hasa7etes.
Hessa gidida gishshi asi wurikka nuna Kiristoosa oothanchata malane Xoossa xuura qonccisanas hadara ekkida asa mala qoodanas besses.
Wolqqa assura carkoy carkidi miththa ayfe qoqofiza mala salope xoolintey qoqofettides.
Hessa gish ta siiqoto! eeqas goynopite; izape hakkite.
Iitta loo7o oothon xoono attin iittan xonettofa.
Hayta ha yoota gish asa qofisiso aggopa. asay ba garssan issay issara qaala geedon paalametontta mala Xoossa sunththan zora. Hessa mala yooy siyizayta moores.
Xoossako shiiqqite izikka intekko shiiqqana. Inteno nagaranchato! inte inte kushe geeshshite, inte nam77u qofan qaxiizayto, inte inte wozina geeshshite.
Inte besonta maado madikko nagara oothista. woga sinthanka inte woga yedhidade gidi qodistana.
Xoossi nuna geshatethas xeeyigides attin tunatethas xeyigibeyna.
Tuma, ba iittatethaninne makali7an tucii oykizayta iittatetha bollan istta makall7atetha wuriso bolla Xoossa hanqoy sallope qoncana.
Ta ishato, siqoy Xoossafe gidida gish nu nu garisa ane siqetos. Asa siqqiza asi wuri Xoossafe yelettidanne Xoosu erizadekko.
Poo7on daysi gishe ba isha ixiizadey ha7ikka dhuma gidon dees.
Inte Kiristoosa suntha gishshi cayettiko boncho ayanay hessika Xoossa ayanay inte bolla shempiza gishshi ufa7ettite.
Phawulossay asa wursii saroothidappe guye Xoossi iza baggara Ayhuda gidonta asa giidoon ooththidayssa wursii issino ashshontta yootides.
Inte garssafe tana ne hano nagara ooththadasa gidi markkara laathanas moottana danddaizadey dizee? ta tummu hasaizade gidiko histtin aazas tana ammaneket?
Qasseka “Ta istta nagarane makal7a nam77antho qopike” gees Goday.
Gaasoyka ay yoonka, hessikka hasa7an gidin eratetha wurson inte duretidista.
Ta ishato tani Xoossa wosan baxetizamala inteka tanara baaxistanamala diza ta oothoykka hani amanizayta achan ekistanamala tasi wosite.
Deereyka iza “ne bolla dayydanthth dees! ne wodhana kooyzay oonne?” gidees.
Iza suuthan gidida ammanon naagarape maristana yarsho histtid Xoossi Yesusa shishides. Izi hessa oothiday kassetidi polletida nagara qaxayonta danida7a adhida ba xiillotethi bessaanaskko.
Wodey meegiza wode gidida gish ooththanchatnne ashshikarati tama eththidi eqoon ho7etes. Pixxirossaykka isttara eqidii ho7es.
Dabullosa gene ootho inte eqistanasa danda7anamala Xoossa olla mayota mayte.
Phixirossayka “Godo! ta nena hai kaalanas ays dandda7ikna? haray attoshshin tani ta shemhaaththaoka ne gish aththa immana” gides.
Asa qofape bollara diza Xoossa sarotethi inte wozinane inte qofa wursii Yesus kiristoosan naagees.
Nuni nu inxxarasayra Godanne Aawa anjjoos. Izinkka Xoossa lemison medhetida asa nayta zaaridi qangoos.

Inte mela ammanontta laymmatiza asara gidontta woykko coo gaphigaphizaytara, kayssotizaytara, eeqas goynizaytara gaagopite guusu gidontta dishin ha7i ta xaafiday ammanayss gishshe laymmatizaytassara woykko mathotizaytara, gaphigaphizaytara, eeqas goynizaytara, asa sunthu moorizaytara woykko cayzaytara, asa miishe bonqizadentara intes issifeteth doopo” ga xaafadis. Heytantta malara haray atto shin kathika issife moppite.
Takka ta baggara Nazirete Yesussa sunththa eqqistanas beses gada qoppadis shin;

Isttas nagara oothope naagetontta amottiza ayfey dess. Isttas nagara ootho siiqiza amotethi ay wodeka simmena. Ammanon buro minni eqqontta asata ballethettes. Miishas gaphigaphetes. Istti qanggettidaytakko.
Mishshera qaxxaretdii himmizadey gidiko doorssat izas gidoontta gish sudhumey yizza woode doorssaatii yegidii bess baqaates, sudhumeyka doorssata daf daf meesene laales.
Dosetida ta ishato hayssa yuushi qoppite. Asi wurikka siyanas esoto, hasa7asinne hanqqos esotopo.
Hessaththoka mishiracho qaala sabakizayti bena koshizayssa mishiracho qaala oothizasope ekkana mala Goday woga wothides.
Tana ammanizay wuri dhuman dontta mala ta poo7o gidada hayssa ha allameza yadis.
Hesafe guye Yesussay Adeza Xoossa keeththan demmidi “hekoo ha7i ne paxadasa kaseysafe Adhizza iita miishi ne bolla gakontta mala nam77anththo nagara othofa” gides
Inte oothizazi wursika siiqon oothite.
Inte tana doosiza gidiko ta azazoyo nagite.

Intes yootizayssa inte akkaye goontta mala naagetite. Heytantti Xoossi biitta bolla diza asa baggara isttas yootizayssa ekontta ixxidi izape attanas danda7ontta aggiko nuni salzope yidayssi nuusi yootishin nu ekkontta ixxiko izape waanidi attanee?
