Inte Xoosu eranape kasse Xoosu gidonta eqatas aylista.
Xoossi naza denththida wode intena issa issa inte iitatethafe zaaridi anjjana mala kassetidi inteko kittides.”
Izi Ayhudata derenine Yerusalame kaataman ooththidayssa wursos nu markka. Qassekka asay iza miththa bolla kaqqi wodhides.
Ta ishato! inte garisan shaaketethi doontta mala intes issi wozinayne issi qofay daana mala inte inte garisan issino gidana mala Goda Yesus Kiristoosa sunthan ta intena woossays.
Inte iitta amale geedon kase inte Xoossafe shaaketidi inte inte qofara iza morikistakoshin.
Paanththatetha iita amotethafe baqqata. Geeshsha wozinara Goda xeeyigiza asatara xiilloteth, ammano, siiqqone saroteth kaalla.
Histinko inte iristoosara issife dendidayta gidiko kiristoosay Xoossa achchan uttidason puden diza hanotetha koyite.

Koyro kiitanchazi ba zayeza punides. Shachine suuthi walakettida tamay medhetides. Duge biitta bolla yegettides. Biittafe cigoy xuugettides. Mithafeka cigoyka xuugetides. Cilila matayka wuri xuugetides.
Qasseka hizgida “Kaseka, ha7ika dizaysso, Wurisaka danda7iza Goda Xoosso, Neni ne gita Godatetha ne kushen oykida gishshine kawotida gishshi nuni nena galatosu.
Yesussayka Izis “Xoossa iimotaayne nena <tana hathe uusha> gizzadey izi o7naakone ne eeriazzko ne iza woosana beses. Izika ness deeyo hath nees immanakoshin” gides.
Intes deyo gidida kiristoosay qoncciza gallas inteka he wode izara issife bonchora qonccana.
Gido attin Yesussay ha yana kittetida Xoossa nay iza gididaysa inte errana malane ammanidi inte iza sunththan deyoo demana mala haysi xaafettdes.
Nu qasse Xoossa bagakko, Xoosu erizay nu gizaz siyana shin Xoossa baga gidontadey gidiko nu gizaz siyena. Tumma ayananne wordo ayana nu shakki erizay hayssankko.

Hayti ha asati yeellay bayinda laymma hanora issi bolla inte digiseson bettiza wode intes dhuphe gidetes. Istti bessi xalala qopeetes. Istti carikon biza iray baynda shaara malako. Ayfey ayifiza woden ayfey baynda xaphope dhoqalletidi nam77uto melida miththa malako.
Hessa gaason Phixxirossay adhdhishin haray attin iza eeshshoy hargganchatappe bagga hargganchata bolla wodhdhana mala harggizayti zinniiza algga bollane zaphpha bolla karen zin7isetes.
Heytantafekka bolara tamamala pofol7u giizza ita ayana wondafista inte wursi toysana danda7anamala amano gondale mala denthite.
Inte oothiza miishi wurs asas gidontta Godas oothiza mala taybidi kumetha wozinape oothite.
Issito maana kaathas ba bayrateth bayzida Eesa mala intefe oonikka laaymattizade woykko Xoossu bonchontade gidi beetontta mala naagetite.
Istti gidiko “nus Barbbanne birsha attin hayssa gideena!” giidi wassida. Barbbanney ba hu7es pangga.
Kaadizayta, nagetontayta, coo mela otorettethan puurdayta, Xoossafe aaththidi loo7o deeth dosizayta gidana.
Hessa gishshi Xoosi iza daro dhoqu hisitides. Sunththfe dhoqu gida sunththu izas immides.
Goda Yesus Kiristoosa wolqape izas yuusa gishshi nu intes yootida wode nuni nu ayfera iza bonchoza beydi marikatoos attin asi coo mela medhi ekkidi gene hasa7iza haysu7e mala gidena.

Izi hayssa ha hanoza gishshi ba kiittattan wurson hayssathoka xaafides. Iza kiittata giddon eranas waayssiza issi issi hanoti deettes. Eratethi isttas paccidayitine nam7u qofan yooqu gizayti hara geesha maxaafata mirqqizayssathoka haytaka issti mirqqana. Istti hessaththo oothizay bess dhayanaskko.
Kitetidayti Barinabassayne Phawulossay Hessa siyida mala ba mayoo dakkidi gede dereza giido woxxida, ba qaala dhoqqu histtidi hizzgida,
Kasse awatas imetida ufaysa qaala polanaso Xoossa tumatetha gish gidi Krisitossa Ayhudatasi othizade gididaysa ta intesi yotanas.
Be duuna nagontta berikka ba wozina baleththishe ta ammanayss gizadey berikka bena baleththees. Iza ammanoykka mella hada ammanokko.
Ashshikaray godape adhena gada ta kase intes yootoysa yushsh qoopite, istti tana godizayti intenaka goddana, istt ta qaala naggizako inte qaala naggana.
Yesussay bena ammanida ayhudata hizzgdes “inte tummu ta qaalan dikko inte tummupe tana kaallizayta gidana.
He wode Kanaaneninne Gibixen daro metto ehida gita koshay dennidides. Nu awataskka miza kaathi dhayides.
Ne naytape bagati aawape nus imetida azazoza mala tuman miini dizayta ta beyida gish daro ufa7istadis.
Issi asi ba daabbota haraappekka ba soo asa maaddonttade gidikko izi ammano kaadiddadene ammanontta asapekka adhdhida iita asakko.
nuni nu iitta qofape geeyanas nu wozina aracetidi nu asatethaka xiillo haathan meecetidi tumu wozinapene kumetha ammanon Xoossako ane shiiqo
Gido attiin “Beni nuna amano gish godi dhaysana koyza adezi haii he amano zari sabakes” Giza wore xala siiyda.
Hessa gish inte kathth maana mala ta intena wossayss. Inte miikko miinnana; muleka aykko qohoykka inte bolla gakkena.”
Neni danda7an minna eqqidayssane ta suntha gishshi saletontta ne waaye beyindayssa ta erayss.
Cimma asay wozinama bonchetidayta bena berkka harizayta amanoninne siiqon danda7anka loo7o gidanamala ista zora.
Kasetidi Xoossi hayssa mala hanota asay errontta ooththidayssa dandda7an adhdhides; Hai gidikko asi wuri ba dizason dizason maaroteththan gelana mala azazzes” gides.
Yesussa masqqalle achchan iza aayiyane aayeeyi michchiya Qeliyyopha machcha Maramane Megidele geetettizasope yida Marama heen eqqida.
Izi qass suuthan madhettida mayo mayides. Iza sunthay qass “Xoossa qaala” geatetes.
Gido attin inte metoy bawa guusan oothizays ammanon minnontta asas dhuphe gidontta mala nagetite.
Qasseeka izi wooqqontayssanne Xoossi iza hayqqooppe denththidayssa shaakki erana mala “anjjetidayssane ammanetida Dawutte anjjoo ta intes immana” gides.
Tani ta aawan diza mala inteka tanan dizaysane taka intenan dizaysa inte he wode erranddista.
Nu iza azazota polliko nu iza eridaysa hessan amanetos.
Inte ta oonnakone erridi ammanontta aggiko inte inte nagarara hayqqana gish ta inte! Inte nagarara hayqqana giday hessa gishshaskko.”
Hinna he maccashaya geeshata suuthanine Yesusa sunthan hayqida asa suuthan mathotidaro tani beyadis. Ta izo beyada daro malalistadis.
Eesay guyepe kase ba anjjoza laatanas zaari koyin izas imetontta digettidayssa inte ereista. Izi bena gakiza anjjozaskka daro yekkishe koyidika zaari demmanas danda7ibeyna.
Deereyka Iza gish garisara sasuqi hasaettdes. issi issi asat “izi loo7o asakoo” gishin bagay qase “loo7o gidena izi dere baleththes” gides.
Goda madoyka isttara des, qoodani kehi daroo asayi ammanidi Godako simmides.

Gido attin nu mishirachchoqaala hadara ekkanas danidaiza asata mala xoossay nuna qoodida gish nu haasaos; hessaka nu oothizay nu wozina paacci erriza Xoossa ufayssanas attin ass ufayssanass giidi gidena.
Gido attin Goda Yesus Kiristoosa baggara nuusu xoono immiza Xoossas galatay gido.
Qasse tumape maadoy bayindda, berkka diza amm7eya Xoossu xaalla xeellawusu. Woosasine Xoossafe maado deemmanas gaallasine qaama miinistawusu.
Hano gakanas inte ta sunththa aykooka wosi eerekista wosiite inte eekana inte uhaaththaaysaykka kumeeththa gidana.

Ammaniza wode ne aylee? Ne hessas daro metotopa; wozistana danda7iko wozista. Gaasoyka ayle gidi dishe Goda ammanidadey izi Goda goqakko. Hessaththoka ammaniza wode goqa gidonttadey izi Kiristoosas ayllekko.
Heyti asa issa issafe shaakizayta; asho amotethi kaalizaytane isttan xiillo ayanay bayindaytakko.
Inte intena Kiristossa kiiyatethan xeygidaysa agagidi hara duma shako mishiracho qaalakko siimidaysi tana daro garanthes (malalises)
Asi wurisora saro daana mala intes danda7etizayssa wursi oothite. Geeyena mala koyite. Geeshatethi baynda Goda beyanas danda7etena.
Izika “Giteza wogoolozape oshshacha baggara abban yeegite, inte demmana” gida gish giiteza abba giido yeegidane daroo mooley oykeetda gish giiteza molara gochchana danddaebeyitena.
Qaxaretin qaxaretontta aggin nam7ankka go7ay baawa. Wanna ayfe yoy Xoossa azazo polokko.
Zorizade gidiko zoro. Baynidaytas immizadey gujji immo. Aysizadey minni aysso. maarizadeyka ufaysan maaro.
“Inte ammanida wode xiillo ayana ekkideti?” gides; Isttikka “ekkibeykko haray attoshshin xiillo ayanay dizakkone nu siyibbeykko” gida.
Hayssa nu kiittida qaalas azazetoonttay oonkka diikko hessa milatizade lo7ethi kaalitene izi ba oothon yeelatana mala izara gaggofite.
Ta ishato ta hayssa intes yootays ashoyne suuthi Xoossa kawotethi laattetena. Dhayanayssi dhayonttayssa laatena.
Dhayaana kaththas oosofite, gido attin hessafe athid xoossa aaway ammaanithza mattame iza bolla shoccida gish asa nay intes immiza medhina deyoos gidiza kaththas ooththite.”
Inte inte asho ufaysanaas iitta qofan wosiza gish wosidaysa inte ekekista.
Hesan Xoossa aawwa Goda Yesuss Kiristossa suntha wuriso mishas wuriso wode galatite.
Ane inte Abirame gish qoppiite “Izi Xoosu amanin amamoy izas xiillotethan qodetides.”
Xoossa bonchoy izis po7iza gishshine dorsazi izi po7o gidida gishshi he katamays awa arishey woykko aginay po7isanas koshshenna.
Inte qasse Xoossa ayanay intenan diza gidiko ashon gidontta ayanan deista. Kiristoosa ayanay iza bolla deennadey he uray Kiristoosas gidena.
Istti ammanontta minni eqidasope simmiko kase beso simmi gelana. Xoossika istta zarisi gelithana danida7ees.
Istti wordo hasa7a erettena. Wothoyka istta bolla baawa.
Gido attin ta nes qonccisana koyzay istti wordo giza Goda ogera nu aawantta Xoossas gooynayssine Musse wogane nabeta maxxahaaththaan xahaaththaetidayssaka wursia ammanayss.
Inte garisan issay issara siiqetethafe attin oona bollaka accoy doopo. Ase siiqiza uray izi wogaa pollides.
Asayka wolqama seelan xuugetides. He bochata bolla sheney izas diza Xoossa sunthu asay caydes attin maarotethan gelibeynane izaka bonchibeyna.

Izis tammane nam7u pengetara diza gita aduussa ginbe lashay dees. He tammane nam7u pengetan tammane nam7u Kiitanchati eqqidi naagetes. He pengeta bolla tammane nam7u Isiraa7eele kochata sunthi xaafeti uttides.
“Miitha bolla kaqetizadey he uray qangetidade” geteti xafetida gish Kiristossay nu gish qangetidade gididi nuna Muse wogga qangethafe wozinas.
Tani kasse Ayhudata amano wana diidakone Xoossa wossa keethe ta aymala godidakone qasse mule dhaysanas ta aymala dafetidakone inte siydista.
he daweza oykid shi laytha qachchides. Hessi dawezi dabulosa woykko xala7e geetettiza kase beni shooshazakko.
Gido attin hessafe kase he kaattamayin maro marotiidi Sammariya asa daroo malalisizaz ooththiza issi Simmona giza maroy dees. Izikka bena giita asa mala qoodizade.
Kiristoosane izi hayqi dendida dentha woliqa ta erana mala iza waayeka ta izara gishistana malane hayqonka ta iza milatana mala amottays.
Xoossa oothos doranas, oona bollakka ne kushe wootha woosanas eesotopa. Qasse haratara nagara oothanas zuupetopa. nagarape nena xiillotethan naaga.
Hesathoka cima maccashati bee diza dussan bonchora dizaytanne loo7o hanoteth asa tamarisizayta gideto attiin asa sunthu isizayta woykko woyne ush ussa suken waxetidayta gidonta mala ista tamarsa.
Hessa gishshi gela7oyo ekidadey lo7o oothides. Ekonttadeyka adhetha lo7o oothides.
Qaalay gizayssa oothite; attin mela siisi xalala siyzadista gididi interkka intena balethofite.
Hesafe guye Yesussay galila garssan yuyettdees, gido attin Yuhudan yuyanas kooybeeyna, gasooykka Ayhudat iza wodhana kooyza gishshasiko.
Intena qasse Xoossi Yesus Kiristoosara issifetethi deyana mala oothides. Hessa gishshi Xooss Yesus Kiristoosa nu erateth, nu xiilloteth, nu geeshatethine nuna ashshizade gidana mala oothides.
Too meecciza gonggen hathth gujjidi bena kaallizayta too meeche oykkdes, ba gixxida pooxanika meccida tooza quccides.
Hayssa ha oggeza kaalliza asata wursia wodhdhana gakkanaas Godaaththiza asakkoshin; maccatane addista qachcha qachcha qachcho keeth yeedizadekoshin.
Hessa gish iza gaason derey ba gidoon shaaketi wodhides.
Intes hadara immetida Xoossa wude naagite. He iza wudeza wolqara gidontta Xoossi koyiza ogera dosara heemmitte. Miishes yiqetethan gidontta haggazanas wozinape koshan gido.
Hayqoy izara dukkiza wolqay nagarakko; Nagara wolqay wogakko.

Inte inte wozinan wothite inte kaththi maxishe pe7idaytas istta wollqa waaga inte qanxxontta aggida gish inte bolla wasishe inte achchan deettes. Kaththi maxizayta wassoy wursi danda7iza Goda haythan gakides.
Hessa gishshi iittateth wursi, baletho wursi, qoodhepe qommon hano, qaanateteth ayko qoommo zigiris intefe digite.
Issi macashi azinay paxxa diza wode kumethan ba azinara qachistadusu. Azinay hayqiko ba koyda ura gelana danda7aysu. Iza gelanadey ammanizade gido attin gelu.
Heyti tumateththape haakkidi coo mela waayetes. isttikka hayqqope denththi hayssafe kase hani adhdhides giidi issi issi asa ammano guye shiri yeeggettes.
Asi Yesuss Kirstossan diko qaxaretin woykko qaxaretonta agin ayne go7ene go7ay dizay siqqon qoncciza amano xala.
Hessa baggara pacey bayndade gidi beetidayssafe guye bena azazetizaytas wurisos medhina atotethas gaaso gidides.
Ha7i qasse ammanizaytas miisha keso gishshi Galatiyan diza woossa keethatas tani immida azazo mala inteka oothite.
Macheeto inte Godas haretizamala inte azinatas haretite.
qasse Yesussay “ta derey poo7o, tana kaallizadey wuri deyoo poo7o demmana, dhuman simerettena.” gidi isttas yootdes.
Inte ta siiqoto nu Goda Yesus kiristoosay kiitti yeddidayti hayssafe kase yootida qaala akekite.
Izi asa wursioos deyoone shamppo qassekka haraka wursii immizade gidida gish izas paccizazi doontta gish asa kushshepe maado ekkena.
Nu asa marikatet ammanikko Xoossa markatethi hessafe adhees. Hesikka izi ba naza gish immida Xoossa markatethakko.
Hessa aggidi Yesus Kiristoosa mayte. Asho amo polanaas qopofite.
Isiraa7eele asay Eyariko gimbeza laapun qamma yuuy yuuy aadhidape guye gimbeza ammanon laalides.
Xoossi Phawulossa baggara daroo mallaliza malata ooththides.
Yesussayka isttas hizzgdes “ta intes tummu gays nagara ooththizadey wuri nagaras aylle.
Ta ishato, Xoosi nuna hayssatho siqqiko nukka nu garsan siqistanas beses.
Ne deyoo ogge ta errana mala ooththadasa, ne tanara diza gish ta uhaaththaayssay kumeth.”
Ta he baana gakkanaas qaal nabbabanas, zoranasine tamarsanas miinna.
Awa baggaraka nuna sugikokka nuni tintth gi meqqoko. Nuus yooy tipp giikoka hidota qanxxoko.
Bagga asay “Hayti daro woyne ush uyida” gidi istta qidhida.
He ginbezi ginbetiday Iyasiphide geetettiza shuchankko. He katamayaka masttote mala geeya uttida geesha worqafe oothistadus.
Laapun bochata oykida laapun kiitanchati Xoossa keethafe kezida. Istti qass geesh gidida xolqettiza bootha mayo mayday. Worqafe oothetida mayo tirabolla aathi mayida.
Intena qanigizayta anjjite attin qanigofite.
Iza tooti tama bonqqon qoxetti kezida qariqimala milatetes. Qaalayka wolqama piissa haathey giiriza mala giires.
Ne tana siqqida siqqooy isttan gidana malane taka isttan gidana mala isttine nena errana mala ooththadis, qasseka istti errana malaka oohthana.”
Be yellos michetontta nu gishshi oothi immiday izako. Hesitin wuriso miishsh nuusu izara kiyatetha aazas immenee?
Istti “Wode wurisethan Xoossa shenepe haakidayti berika ba iitta amo kaallishe ase qidhizayti yaana” giidi intes kase yooti wothida.
Heyta he meqqi wodhdhida hangista bolla othoretofa. inte istta bolla otoretiko qasse hanno wozinan wothite. He miththaa tookiday nena gidaka. miththay nena tookides attin.
Inte ammanon eqida gishshi intena ufaysanas nu intenara oothana attin inte ammano bolla godatanas gidena.
Bittaniiya gizasoon Marammane diza manddaran Allazzare geetettizadey saketides.
Hessa gish hayssa ha zoreza kadhdhidi ekkonttadey xiillo ayana izas immida Xoossa kadhdhes attin asi kadhdhizade gideena.
Inte Xoossa ayana erana ogey; “Yesuss Kirstossay asa asho maydi yides” giza ayanay wuri Xoossafeko.
Hessaththoka heyti he asati berika ba agumo kaallidi berika ba asho tunathetes. Beepe bollara dizaytas azazetetena. Istti salon bonchora dizaytaka cayettes.
Iitta yoope hakkone lo7o ootho; saroteth koyone kaallo.

Hessika hananay inte ammanon xaphidine giigetidi inte inte ammanon ekkida mishshiracho qaalape qaaxxontta minni eqqikokko. Intesinne salo gufanththon diza medhetethas sabaketida mishiracho qaalay hessako. Ta Phawulosayka hayssa ha mishshiracho qaalas oothancha gidadis.
ayhudat heraka iza caddanas wuri shuchchu denththida. gido attin Yesussay istta matape qotetidii xoossa keethafe kezi bides.
Tumu xillotethaninne geshatethan Xoosu milatana medhetida ooratha asateth mayte.
Xoossa azazo naagizaytapene Yesusa ammanon minnida geeshatape koyettiza danda7ay haninkko.
Gido attin Xoossi iza hayqqoppe denththides.
Ta loo7o hemmizzade, loo7o hemiizzdey ba shmppo ba doorssata gish aththi immees.
Ta intena go7ana mala Xoossi kiytethan taas oothos exxa imidaysa inte tumape siydista.
Asa garsan shakoteth medhiza asa isi to nam7u to ne zorin ekonta ixxiko izadera nes ispetethi doppo.
Hessa he qaalape denddaysan ayhudata garssan qasseka shaketeth medhetdees.
Iza marrkethe ekkzadeey gddko Xoossa tumanncha gdidaaysa qonncsees (besees)
Hessa gishshi ta siiqoto! hessi wurikka hanana gallas inte naagishe diiko Goday intena inte bolla boroy bayinda dishin sarotethan demmana mala minni ditte.
Wurththethan ta ishato qassekka Goda qaalay inte achchan hanoyssathoka eleeli wurssoso gakkana malane bonchetana mala nuus woosite.
Gaasoyka Goda Yesus Kiristoosa hayqope dentthidayss nunaka izara issife dentthidi intenara ba sinttha shishshanaysa nu erosu.
Inte gidon saketiza assi dizee? diiko wossa keeththa ciimata xeyigo. Isttikka Goda sunththan zayte iza bolla tiyidi izas wosseto.
“Muse laaythi ooydu tamu gida wode Musey ba ishata Isira7elle nayta beyanas ba wozinan qoppides.
Hayssa addeza Ayhuda asati oykki wodhdhana gishin izi Rome assi gididayssa ta gakka errida gish olla asatara gakkada ashshadis.

Herakka kummetha kaatamay shirotides; Deereykka wuri issi bolla gididi Maqqidoniya asa gididaytane Phawulossara isfe yuyiza iza laaggista Gayiyossane Arisxxirokossa oykkidi derey kasse kaizaso woththan gellida.
Geeshsha na xiilloza inte kadidi shemmppo wodhdhizaysi birshistana mala wossidista.
Istta wozinakka ammanoon geshshidi nu giidonine istta giidoon aykoo shakokka ooththibeyna.
Oonka hayssa ha uketha manapene ushshafe uyanape kaseti berka bena pacco.
Hessa gishshi ta siiqo ishato minni eqite. Ay miishanka yariki yarikopite. Goda oothos inte daburiza daburisay hada gidonttayssa eridi wurso wode pacey bayinda Godas oothanas minettite.
Hessa gishshi inte tana milatana mala ta intena woossays.
Xoossa eratethafe dendidayssan alamey ba eratetha giddon Xoossu eroy xoonin sabako eeyatethan ammanizayta ashshanas Xoossa shene gidides.
Hessaththoka macheto! inte inte azinatas azazetite. Hessatho issi issi azinati Xoossa qaala ammanonttayta gidikkoka coo mela ba machcheta lo7etethan xalala simmontta agettena.
Xoossi nu baggara asi xeygiza gishshi nuni qasse Kiristoosa ogathatakko. Hessa gishshi “Inte Xoossara iginttite!” giidi nu intena Kiristoosa sunthan woossos.
Gido attin Xoossi iza bollafe hayqqo wolqa diggidi hayqqope denththides. Hayqqoykka iza oykki ashshanas dandda7ibeyna.
Intenan xeygetida boncho Xoossa sunththa zigirizayti ista gidetenee?
Maathotonttade; ooshshu oyetonttade; qass maarage as; asara pallametonttade; miishshe goodonttade; godanas beesses.
Ta imizza hath uyzzadey medhinas mulleka samoottena. Gssoykka ta immiza hath uyizzades medhina deyoos ppulttiza puullto hath gidana.”
Qase oonikka iza qaala nagiko tumu Xoossa siqqoy he 7uran polletides. Nuni izan dizaysa erizay hessankko.
He daweza duunapene he do7aza duunape, wordo nabeza duunape oqaris milatiza hedzdzu tuna ayanati kezishin ta beyadis.
Maxaafan “Ne lagge ne hu7e mala siiqa” geeteti xaafettida kawo woga inte polikko loo7o oothista.
Nuni Yesus Kiristoosay Goda gididaysa sabakoos attin nuna sabakoko. Nuka nu baggara Yesusa gishshi intes oothizadentta gididosu.
Inte balettofite “Iitta lagetethi, lo7o amalera dizayta moores.”
Dorthata hethanchay wogga Goda Yesus kiristoosa ba medhina caaqo qaala suuthan iza hayqope denthida sarotetha Xoossi,

Kiristoosa mishiracho qaalas bessiza mala diite. Hessatho hanika ta intena hee baada be7idako woykko hahon daada inte gishshi ta siyizako inte mishiracho qaala ammanos issino oletishe issi ayanan inte minni eqnayssa ta erayss.
Xoossi Goda hayqope denthida mala nunaka qasse ba wolqan hayqope denthana.
Hessa gish ta ta kushe ne bolla wothin ne ekkidayssa ne bolla diza xoossa imota ne denththethana mala ta nena qoofissayss.
Hayqidaytassara miishiracho qaalay yootetiday hessa gishikko. Hessaththoka ay asa bollaka piridiza mala istta asho bolla piridana. Istta shempoy qass Xooss diza mala deyon deyana.
Inte miishan shametidista. Hessa gishshi asa aylle gidopite.
Istta garisafe issi issi asati zuzumetidi dhaysiza bocha kiittanchan dhaydayssatho inteka dhayontta mala zuzumopite.
Nuni Wodhe demanas giidi Xoossa qaala shaqaca mala walakerethidi bayziza daro asata mala gidoko. Gido attin Xoossafe kiitettida suure asa mala gidid Kiristoosan gidid Xoossa sintthan sure yootos.
Nuni amanoni minidayti hanko amanoni minotayi meto tokanasi besisi attiin nu Xoossa ufaetizayta gidanaso nusu besena.
Taka inteko mata wode baanaysa Godan ammanetayss.

Hessafe guye oyddu kiitanchata biitta bolla oyddu baggara eqidayta beyadis. Isttika biitta bolla gidin woykko abba bolla woykko miththa bolla ay carkoyka carkontta mala oyddu baggara yiza bocha carko wursi oykida.
Hinko dere asati oothizayssa mala inte coo mela yeda duussan asho amon, mathon, wogape ogey bayinda kaassan, wogape aathi uyidi durusanine harassiza eeqa goynon kase inte athida wodezi intes gidana.
Oonika istta qohanas koyko istta duunape tamay kezidi istta morikista xuugana. Istta qohana koyzadenti wuri hayqanay hessa malankko.
Phawulossaykka isttas “ta ishato! izi qeessista hallaqa gididayssa errabeykke; Gasooykka <he dere hallaqa bolla iitta qaala gooppa> gizayssi xaafetides” gides.

Gidikoka ta nena kadhiza issi miishey ne bolla dess. Hessika Bala7ame timirtte oykida issi issi asati inte giddon dettes. Hessi bala7amey Isiraa7eele asay eeqas yarshettida kathi miidine laymma laymmatidi dhuphistana mala Baalaqe zoridadekko.
Ta ishato inte ammanoy wodepe woden diicci diicci biza giishshine inte siiqqoyka inte garsan gujjeti gujjeti biza gish nu inte gish Xoossa lo7ethi galatanas beeses.
Inte ammananape kase coo mela heene haane guussan inte erontta kaalethetidi duuna muume gidida eeqatako bidayssa inteka ereta.
Azinato, Kirstossay wossa keethayo siiqida malane bena izi gish athi imida mala inteka inte machcheta siiqite.
Oonasikka iitta gishshi iitta zaaropite. Asi wuriso achan loo7o miishshi oothanas minnite.
Hessa gishshi Xooss ba woden dhoqu hisitana mala minno Xoossa kuushepe garssara intena ziqq histite.

Gido attin Xoossi salope errane hessaththokka kaathi kaaxxiza wodeta immidi inte woziina kaththanine uhaaththaayssan kunththides, uhaaththaayssankka intena kallithidi loo7o ooson bena markkay bayndda aggibeyna.
Macca daaqonetikka bonchetidayta; zigironttayta; qass wogara dizayta; hano wursson ammanetidayta gidanas beesses.
Iza maarotethan gelana mala ta izis wode immadis shin iza qass ba laymmatethaf simmanas koyabeyku.

Herdossayka Xirosa asarane Siidoona asara ooshsha. He dere asay kaath demmizay Herodossa derepe gidida gish he dere kawoo xelizade Bilasxoossappe maado qaala deemmida mala issi bolla Herdossara iginththana giidi oychchida.
Yesussay isttas hizzg zaarides. “tani ta aawa bonchays attin daydanththi ta bolla baawa, inte gidiko tana kawushshista.
wolqama carkkooy carkkiiza gish abbay keez qaaxides.
Ha7i nu ekiza waayey buro nuusu sinithan giigi uttida bonchozara gathi xellishin aykokka gidena gays.
Ta nayto inte nagaray Yesus kiristoosape denddidayssan atto geetetida gish ta intes xafays.

Nu aykkoka oothida gish gidontta dishin ba qofa malane ba kiyatetha mala nuna ashshidayine nuna bees duummathidi izi xeeyigides. He iza kiyatethay medhdhina wodepe kase Yesuss Kiristtoossa baggara nuus immettides.

eQessista halaqatine istta ashshikarat Yesussa beeydi “Ne iza kaqqa! kaqqa!” gishe wasiida, Philaxxossay qasse “Ta ta baggara iza bolla issi moroka demmabeyke, koykoo inte ehaaththaidii kaqqite” gides.
He atotethaza gishshi intes imistana kiyatethas kase nabeti lo7ethi wozinape pilig xeellida.
Yesus Kirstossay asa asho maydi yibeyna giza amanonta daro balethizayti alame bolla laletida. Heyta malay ay assikka as ballethizadene Kirstosara eqetizadeko.
Hayssi addezi nus iita hariige gididees; alamen diza Ayhudata wursio bolla meto medhdhes, nazirawe geettetiza wordo asata wanna kaallethizadey izakko.

Tumu ayana duussa xuuray sidhey bayindda gita; izikka “ase gidides; iza xilotethi Xillo ayanan qoncides; kiittanchatas beettides; ammanontta deres yootetides; alamen dizaytan ammanettides; bonchora pude denddi bides” gizayssako.
Issi issi shachay oyddu tammane ichachu kilo gidiza shachi salope duge asa bolla wodhides. Bochazi daro iitta gidida gishshi asay he shacha bocha geedon Xoossu caydes.
Gido attin nuni izi nuusu immida ufayssa mala xiillotetha oothoy oothetizasso oratha salone oratha biitta naagoosu.
Saloyka waraqata mala xaaxettidi kichides. Zumatine abba giddon diza gadeti wurikka ba dizasope dhay gidida.
Hayssa ha “iza shene” giza qaala mala hara yarsho zaarethi shiishanas koshontta mala Yesus kiristoosa baggara issi to shiiqida yarshon geeydosu.
Nu intena nu woosan qoppishe wursso wode Xoossa inte gish galatoos.

Qasseka hara xeeq zo7o paray kazides. He parazoza toggidadey biitta bollafe sarotethi dhayssana malane asay ba. e garisan issay issa wursana mala oothisanas izas Godatethine wogga gita mashshay imettides.
Xoossa sunththine iza timirttey cayetontta mala aylletetha qambbara garssan dizayti wuri ba godas kumetha bonchoy beessizayssa ereetto.
Kase ceega asatetha iza oothora gathi intefe qaari yeggida gishshi inte inte garisan issay issara wordo hasa7opite.

Gido attin ta nena kadhiza miishi dess. Hessika bena “Ta nabekko” giza maccashayo Elizabelo neni bessa aggida gishshi iza taas oothizayti laymma laymmatana malane eeqas yarishetida kathi maana mala iza tamarisada balethadus.
Dere asay amanon atanaysa eridi Xoosu kasse maxxafan “Derey wuri ne bagara anjjistana” Giidi mishiracho qaala Abiirames erisides.
Inte Xoossa nayta gidi uttidi qaalay gizayssa balidista. “Ta naazo Xoossa seera kawushan xeelofa, Nena izi seeriza wode ufayssi qanxxofa.

Intena kaallethizaytas azazetitene haaretite. Hessas gaasoyka inte gishshi istta alafetethan daro oychiza guday diza gishshi inte shempo gishshi daro baxetetes. Hessa gishshi istti ba oothiza oothoza lanccetishe gidontta ufayssan oothana mala inte isttas azazetite. Inte hessaththo hisitontta aggiko intes lo7ena.
kanane biittan dizayita lappun kawoota dhayissidi istta biitta ba deretas ista gade histti latissiides.
Oonikka wordo timirtte tamarsikko Goda Yesuss kiristtoosa loo7o qaalane ayana tumatetha minssiza timirttera gaaggonttayssa gidikko
Oonikka intekko yishe hessa he timrteza ekii yonta ura mokkii ekofiitene saro gopiite.
Kiristoosa waayey nu bolla daridaysa mala nuusika Kirstoossa baggara mintthethoy darees.
Istti Qayele ogen bida gishshi miishas giidi Bala7ame mala balan kunidida. Qasse Qoorey eqettida mala isttika eqettidi dhayida gish istas aye.
Hayti asati qasse isttas eretontta ixxida mishsha wursi cashe cayetes. Aykoka erontta mehista mala coo ba qopi ekkida miishi isttas diiko istti hessan dhayana.

Nohes Xoossi buro Nohey ba ayfen beyontta miisha gishshi naagettana mala yootin Nohey Xoossa babbidi ba so asa ashanas ammanon marikabe kexxidi alame asa piridisides. Ammanon bettiza xiillotethi laatizade giddies.
Wurika hessaththo giigetidape guye qesseti ba ootho polanas dunkanas koyro kifile geletes.
Inteno wozana mumeto, haytha tuleto, intekka inte aawata amala wursio wode Xiillo Ayanara eqateista.

Qassekka wogay immetiday xiillo asas gidontta woga yedhdhi aadhdhizaytas, azazetonttaytas, Xoossas babbonttaytass, nagaranchatas, geeshshateth bayinddaytas, Xoossu leeqqizaytas, ba Aayone ba Aawa wodhdhizaytasine shemppo wodhdhizaytas gididayssa nu eroos.
Intes laymmatiza asatara issifetethi dontta mala ta intes kase dabiddabe xaafadisikoshin.
Gido attiin kasse koyro tana ta ayy ullon bes shakiida ba kiiyatethan ana xeygida Xoossi.
Tani ta oothizayssa erike. Ta oothana koyzayssa ootha erike shin ta ixxiza miishsh oothays.
Hessape bollara nu Godane nu dhale Yesus Kiristoosa kiyatethanine iza shaaki eron pude diccite. Izas ha7ika medhinasikka bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
Nu Kiristoosa gishshi eeyata gididosu. Inte qass Kiristoosan eranchatakko. Nuni daburanchata, inte gidiko minotakko. Inte bonchetidayta; nuni gidiko kawushatakko.
Alame kuumethan diza inte ishati hessa mala meto ekkana dizayssa inte eridi amanon minni eqqidi izara eqetite.
Aylleto, ase ufayssanasine coo ayfeson beistanas gidontta suure wozinape inte Godas babbite. Hayssa biittan haariza godataskka hano wurson azazetite.
“Ne beyida tammu kaceti buro kawotontta tammu kawotakko. Gidikoka istti he do7azara issife issi saates do7azara kawotanas kawotetha wolqa demmana.
Xoossafe nuusu imettidayssa nuni erana mala Xoossa ayanay nuusu imettides attin nuni hayssa ha alameza ayana ekibeykko.
Histikko inteno dure asato, ane siiyte. Buro inte bolla gakkana metoza gish yekiite, wu! wu! gi wasiite.

Buro sinthafe ne bolla gakkana metos babbofa. Inte paacettana mala intefe issi issi ura dabulosay qasho keeththa gelithana. Tamu gallas gakkanaas inte waaye beyanashin ne hayqqana gakkanaas ammanetidade gida. Tani ness deyo akilile immana.
Neno Xoossa aso! ne hessa wurssofe baqata. Xiilloteth, tumu ayyanan duussu, ammano, siiqqo, dandda7ane ashshiketeth kaalla.
Inte biitta bolla ishallonne aloo7etethan deyidista, inte wozina shuka galasas dhiikki handadhathidista.
Hessaththoka he algaza yuuyi adhdhida nam7u tammane oyddu algati dettes. He algata bolla qass bootha mayo mayidi ba hu7e bolla worqa akilile woththida nam7u tammane oyddu cimati utti dettes.

Iza bees, ba bonchosine bees giigana mala immoyssa gina waayene muzoteth izis immite; iza ba wozinara <Tani kawo machi mala uttadis attin ami7i mala gidike. Tana muuzoteth muleka gakena” ga ceeqistataysu.

Azinato! inte inte machchetara akekan issife deyte. Istti intefe daburancha medheteth gidida gishshine qasseka Xoossi coo mela kiyatethan immiza deyo istti intenara issife laatanayssa gishshi inte istta bonchite. Inte heyssatho oothiko inte woossa dhuphiza miishey deena.
Maccashshi coou gaanape attin iza tamarssana mala woykko adde bolla godatana mala koykke.
Izi ba naaza nu Goda Yesus Kiristoosa issipetethako intena xeygida Xoossi izi ammanetida Xoossukko.
Ta ishato inte goqateth kezanas xeygetidista. Inteni inte goqateth zaridi untafe dutheto sho amo polanas go7etopite. Hessafe inte inte garisan siqqon isay isa madite.
Inte hasa7a hasa7ishe woykko issi miishshi oothishe intena xiillisiza asa mala gidite.
Oothoyka duma duma gidshin Goday gidiko issakko.
Kase Aawatikka istta bagga Kiristoosa asho baggara istta zeretha zariken qoodetes. Izikka wurisofe bolla gidida medhinas galatetida Xoossa; amin7i.
Nu meton inte atotethine minoteth demmista. Nuni metotishin qasse inteka kase ekida metoza mala gencci ekkid ministandista.
Hessa gishshi inteka nunika Kiristoossan minni eqana malane ba oothos dooriday Xoossuko.
He kasse qaalay qasseeka nammm7anththo izaako yidi “xoossi geshshidayssa ne tuna mala qoodopa” gides.
Izira laymmatishe ishalo duusu deyida ha biitta kawoti iza xuugetishin cuwatiza cuwa beyid izi gishshi waassid yeekana.
Yesussayka izas hizzgdes. “tana siqqizadey ta qaala nagana, ta aawayka iza dosana, nuni izako yana, yidika izadeera isipee deyana.
Nuni Xoossu siqqibeykko shin izi nuna siqides. Nu nagara dhaysana mala ba naza yeddides. Siqo gusikka hessakko.
Gido attin izi poo7on diza mala nukka poo7on simeretiko nu garisan nuus isipetethi dees; iza na Yesuss Kirstosa suthi nuna Nagara wurisofe geshees.
Hesa gish hayssafe guye ne nape attiin ayle gidaka. Nuni na gidida gish Xoossi nena bena latizade histides.
Nza gishshi qasse “Godo ne zupaney medhinape medhina gakanas minni deyana. Neni ne kawotetha like kaalethasa.
Ayudatiika “nu nena shuchchara caadizay ne coo asi gida dashe nena nerkka xoossu kessada caashsha qaala ne hasaida gishshasape attin ne loo7o ooththidaysa gish gideena” gidii izas zaarida.

Istti izan xuugettiza tamape keziza cuwazi medhipe medhinas pude kezishe daana. He do7azasine iza misilezas goynizayti woykko iza suntha malata ba bolla wothidayti wurikka wonttan qaman isttas shempoy deena”
Xoossa marotetha darope dendidaysan haysi ha oothozi nuus diza gishshi nuni hidota qanxxoko.
Hessa gishshi kumetha wozinape nuni “Goday taas maado; ta babbike. Tana asi ay oothana danda7izee? goosu.
Bettidayssa wursi mizadey wursi monttade kadhopa. Monitadey qasse mizade bolla piridofo. Xoossi wursaka ekides.
Minotethine danida7a immiza Xoossi inte Yessus Kirisitosa kallishin intesi inte gidon ayana isipetetha iimo.

Izi hanko qessata halaqata mala koyro ba nagara gishshi qasseka kaalethidi hanko dereza nagara gishshi gallas gallas yarsho shiishanas iza koshshena. Izi bena aathi immida wode asa nagara gishshi issi too sinththa baggassara yarsho wu wursi polides.
Mishey diza uray oonikka ba ishay wayetishin beydi izas michetonta agiko Xoossa siiqqoy izan wani danee?
Nuni ashope shaaketidi Godara duusu dooranaysa ta sidhontta yootays.
Ta siiqoto! inte hayssa alameza bolla imathene bete asi gidida gishshi shempora olettiza asho amotethatape haakana mala ta intena hadara gayss.
Ase wursika bonchite. Ammanizayta siiqite. Xoossas babbite. Kawo bonchite.
Muses Xoossi iza kushshen issta wozanayssa iza asay akekkiza millatides. Gido atiin issti hessa yuushi qoppibeyteena.
Heyta kana mala husikatizaytape iitta oothizaytapene asas meqethi menthiza asatape naagettite.
Isti bena nu Xoosu eros getes shin ba hanotethan dikokka gidiko kadetes. Isti shunizayta, azazetontaytanne loo7o oothos besontaytakko.
Istti Xoossa yoosi michetizayta gididaysa ta istta gishshi marikatana danida7ays; Istta michetethi gidiiko eratethan gidena.
Nuka nu baggara Xoossafe demmida minotethan metotetizayta mintthethanas danda7ana mala nu meton izi nuna mintthethees.
Tumu Xoossa qaala yootizadene yeellachontta oothanchane asi ne gish loo7o markkattizade gidada nenateth wurssa Xoossa sinthth shiishshanas minna.
Izikka Xoossu geeteti gooyinetiza eeqa xoossata wurssofe bollara bena dhooqu dhooqu histtizadene Xoossara eqetizade. Izikka xoossa keeththan uttidi bena “tani xoossa” giidi awajje awajjisana.
yelidayto inteka inte nayta hanqeetisopite giido attin inte nayta Goda zoreen suran diichite.
Nuna aazika shakena. Haysa wurison nuna siqidaysan xoonizaytapekka nu aadhosu.
Nu wurkka biita bolla kundidishin Ayhudata qaalara <Sawulle! Sawulle! tana aazas goddazi? Neni qara maashsha bolla eqqiikko nerkka nena qohasa> giza qaala siyadis.
Tani ne waayezane ne manqotetha erayss. Gidikoka neni dureko. Ayhude gidontta dashe bena nuni Ayhudeko giza xala7e maabara gididayti heyti ne sunthu mooroyssa ta erayss.
Siiqoy tumanipe attin makali7an ufa7ettena.
Hessa gish tunatethinne dalggida iittatethi intefe kessi yegidi inte shemppo ashanaas danda7iza inte gidon toketida qaala ashketethara ekkite.
Ta tokadis; Apholsay haathi ushshids; dichchday gidiko Xoossukko.
Hara nam7antho kiitanchay qass “Dereza wursa mathothiza, laymma woyne ush ushshida macashiya hinnaka wogga gita Babilona kundadusu! Kundadusu!” gishe koyro kiitanchaza kaallides.
Ta Intena ta azazii wursi inte poliko inte ta laggeta.
Heytantti issi issi keeth kolxx gelidi daro deexxo nagaranine duumma duumma iita ammotetha garss gelidi heene ha qaaxxiza ammano laafa maaccashshata qaxxi oykkettes.
Hesatho hano agidi ane tuma siiqon hasaishe ispetethan hu7e gididaysako hanizazan wurison ane diccos. He hu7ezikka Kiristosako.
Sarotethi immiza ayana isipeteth naganas miinite.
Sawuleykka Godo ne oonnee? giides. Izikka izas “tanni ne goodeththiza Yesussakko!
Goda Kiristoosa inte wozinan bonchitene iza inte deyos Goda histtite. Intes diza ufayssa gishshi intena oychizaytas wurisos malthe immanas wurso wode giigeti uttite.

Godaykka izas hayssi ne eqqidasoy geeshaso gidiida gish ne toope ccamma shoda. Gibxen diza ta dereta waye ta tuumappe beyadis. Issti wasiza issta waye waso siiyada ista ashshanas woodhdhadis. Ne ha7ikka haya ta nena duge Giibixe zarada kiitana gides.
Inte koyro siyda qalaya intenan du; inte koyro siydara intenan diko intekka nazanne aawan daana.
Ta intes tummu gays, oonnika ta qaala naggikoo hayqqo muleka hayqqena.
Hessafe guye issi gita bootha algane he alga bolla uttidayssa, biittayne saloy iza sinthafe baqatida shin istti biidi gelanasoy beettibeyna.
Qasse Kaathi uloskko; uloyka kaththaskko. Gido attin Xoossi nam7aka dhayssana. Asatethi Godassife attin laymmas gidena. Godayka asatethaskko.
Hessaththoka inte nagaras hayqidi Xoossas Yesus Kiristoosa baggara paxxa dizaysa erite.
Gido attin Kirstoosa baggara wurso wode nuna xoono ogen kallethi yuushizane ba lo7e eratetha nu baggara wurso son qoncisiza Godas galatay gako.
Nu izape siydi intes yootiza kiitay Xoossi poo7o iza acahan mulekka dhumay dena gizaysako.
Ta aaway tas immizaay wurkka taakko yana, takoo yizade ta gedee kaare goodike.
Inte inte gidon ishata mala dosetite.
Hessa gishshi izi istta gigissana cimatishe wuriso wode hayqontta paxa eqqi diza gishshi iza baggara Xoossako yizayta wursi ashanas danda7es.
Gido attin istti qass “Gede digga, gede digga, kaqqa” gishe wasiida. Philaxxossayka “inte kawoo kaqqoo?” gides. Qeessista halaqati zaaridi “nus Qessarepe hara kawooy deena” gida.
Hessa malaka ha7i ha wodezanika Xoossa kiyatethan Isiraa7eele asape dooreti attida guuthati deetes.
Biitta bolla diza kawoti wurka izira laymmatida. Biitta bolla diza asayka izi laymmatetha woyne cajen mathottides.
Inte inte garisan issay issara ishata mala loo7ethi siqetite. Issay issa beppe aathi bonichizayta gidite.
Xoossa ayanan kallizadenti heytantti istti Xoossa naytakko.
Hessaththoka hara malatay salo bolla bettides. Izas laapun hu7eyne tammu kaceti diza issi gita dawey bettides. Iza hutista bollaka laapun zawudeti dettes.
Nuni iza nayti gidikko nu iza latizaytako. Nu iza bonchoza latizayta gidana mala adafeka izara iza metoza gishetezayta gidikko nu Xoossu latizadeko; Kirisitossara issife latizayitakko.
Woosa keeththa lo7ethi ayssizayti haraapekka saabakonine tamarson miinniza cimati gidikko dikko mado madistanas beesses.
Gido attin hessa asi wuri erena. Issi issi asati hano gakanas eeqqa goyno dosida gishshi hessa mala asho miishe addaka Eeqas shuketidayssa qopetes. Isttas qofay laafa gidida gishshi istti tunetes.
Ta bolla dishe ayfe immoontta hangge wuris ta aaway qanxxii diigana, ayfiza hangge gujji ayfaana mala qirxxi geshshana.
Hesathoka inte hallafetetha garisan dizayta yeedhi haaron gidonta wudezas loo7o emuuso beson gido.
Ta ishato inte shempidayta gish erontta attana mala nu koyokko. Qasseka ufayss bayindda hinkko hara asata mala inte muuzootana mala nu koyokko.
Isiraa7eele asay mela biitta bolla hamuttiza mala Eritera abba gidora ammanon pinides. Gibixe asay qasse issitatho hanana gishshi abban mitettides.
He wode Musey yeletides. Izikka Xoossa achan dosetida malla loo7o na gidides. Be aawa keeththan hedzdzu aggina all7isson diccides.
Izika ba baggara daburachcha gidida gishshi erontta asatasine oge balidaytas qadhetana danda7es.
Qamay aadhin wonttana gees. Hessa gishshi ane nu dhuma ootho wora yeggidi poo7o olla miishshe mayosu.

Inteno Godato inteka inte oothisizaytas hessaththo oothite. Istasie intes Goda gididay bolla sallon dizaysa izikka as ayeso xeeli madontayssakka intekka eriiza gish oothanchata babiso agidi loo7o oothite.
Ufa7etizaytara ufa7etite; muzotizaytara muzotite.
Gido attin neni ne wozina mumetethanine marotethi koyontta ne wozina geedon tuma Xoossa piiriday qoniciza wode Xoossa hanqo gallasa ne daro hanqqo shiishshasa.
Ayhudeti qass Anxxokiyappene Iqqoniyope yida asay asa zooridi Phawulossa shuchchan caddana mala ammanthida. Phawulossakka shuchchan cadiddinne hayqqidees gi gochchidi kaatamape gede kare kessida.
Yesussay hessa gi simmidi kezi qoofan gelidinee “ta intes tummu gays inte garssafe isadey tana aththi immana” gidi qonccen yootdes.
Qasse maxxafay haysi 7alamey wurikka nagaran qachetidaysa awajjes. Hesikka asi wurikka Yesuss Kiristossa amanon betiza ufaysay amanizaytas wurisos imistanasa.
Istti ba markatetha wurithidape guye hirki ciimma ollafe kiziza do7ay isttara olettidi istta Xoonanane wodhana.
Nuusi kase koyrope diza ammano nuni wuriseth gakanas lo7ethi minthi oykiko nuni kiristoosara issife laatana.
Kiristoosay inte gidon dikko qasse inte asatethay naagara geedon hayqethi gidikokka inte ayanay qase xiillotetha gaason deyon dees.
Nbistappe inte aawati gooddonnta naabey oonee? Xiillozi yanayssa kasseti yottida nabetakka wodhida intekka ha7i izza aathi immidistane wodhidista.
Qanateteth mathoteth 7lame yeth yexxethane heytanta milatizayta. Tani intes kaase yotida mala ha7ka inte nagistanamala qofisays. Hesamala dusu dizayti wurikka Xoossa kawotethi latetena.
Inte poo7o nayta gidana mala poo7oy dishin poo7on ammanite” Yesussay hessa gidape guye bidi istta ayfepe gemmides.
Musey Xoossa keethe wuriso bolla ammanetidade gidida mala Yesusaykka bena shuumidades ammanetidadeko.
Hesaka Xiillo Ayanay nu bolla nu Gooda Xoossi nuna ashida Yesus Kirstosa bagara keezi darsi gusides.
Qophirose geetettizason diza Yossefo geetettizadey issi Lewe bagga assi dees. Izikka kittetidaytan “Barnnabassa” geeteti sumides. Hessas birshechay “minththetho naa” guussikko.
Ane nu loo7o ootho oothanas azaloko nu ufaysi qanxonta agiko wodey gakishin nu gakida kaatha maxana.
Tani Xoossas danamala Muse wogga bagara he wogas hayqasdis.
Hessafe guye ta izara wadha wadhdhanas guufe milatiza shombeqoy taas imettides. Taas hizgetides “Neni dendada Xoossa woossa keethazane yarsho yarshiza soza wadha! heen goynizayta tayba.
Heyti machchonttayta gidida gishshi istti macara aqqidi tunbeyttena. Istti dorisay bizaso iza kaalletes. Istti Xoossasine iza dorisazas asa garisafe xeera kaatha mala shiiqidaytakko.
Booleti qass olas giigettida parazota milatettes. Isttas hu7e bolla worqa aklile milatiza miishey dees. Istta ayfesoy asa ayfeso milates.
Inte Xoossas oothiza asata mala gididi hirgay bayinda deyte attin inte inte shene mala diza duussa iittatetha kammiza miishe histopite.
Nu hessas giidi dafettoossine daabuross. Hessikka asa wurssos harapekka ammanizaytas ashiza deyo Xoossan nu ufayss oothiza gishshaskko.
Histin Xoossa na kadhida uray izan geeyida caaqo suutha hiraysso miisha mala qoodidadesine iza kiyatetha ayana isethidades ay mala hessafe adhiza piriday izas ba ssiza intes milatizee?
Hessafe guye qasseka Yesussay istta “intes saaroy gido! ta aaway tana kittda mala taka intena kittays” gides.
Heyti he asati wuriso wode zuzumettizaytane ay miishanka ufa7etti eronttaytako. Istti ba iitta amo kaallizaytako. Istta duunan otoretetha qaalay kumides. Bessi ba go7a koyishe ase aadasheetes.
Biitta bolla diza kawoti, biitta haarizayti, ola halaqati, dureti, wolqamati, ashikaratine Godati wurikka gongolo giddonine zumata garisan zaalata garisan qotettida.

Gido attin hanko baboti, isttas ammanoy bayindayti, tunati, asa shempo wodhizayti, Laymmatizayti, betizayti, eeqas goynizayti, wordotizayti, heyta wursota qaaday diinen exxiza tama abba giddon gidana. Hessika nam7antho hayqokko.”
Histtin ha7i aazas gamm7azi denddada iza sunththu xeeyigada xammaqista, ne nagarapekka meccista.>
Istta hu7e ithikey macasha hu7e ithike milates. Istta achchey qass gaamo achche milates.
Goda oothanchay asara oyeettanas beessena. Hessafe asa wursso achchan kiya, asi tamarsanas dandda7izadene miino as gidanas beesses.
Ta intefe asho ayine haaka diikoka ayanan intenara issife dayss. Inte wogara dizayssane inte kiristoosa lo7eth ammanizayssa beyada daro ta ufa7istayss.
Goda ayfeti xiillota bagga xeelletes. Iza haythetika istta woossa siyanas doya deetes. Hinko iitta oothizayta qass Goday ba hanqo ayfeso bessana”

Godan dosetida ta ishato nu gidiko wursso wode inte gish Xoossu galatanas nuus beeses. Gasooykka Xoossi intena koyrope oykkidi inte xiillo ayanan dummatidaytane tumu ammanidi inte attana mala intena doordes.
Phixxirossayka hizzgides marotethan gellite; inte nagaray maristana mala intefe issi issi urray Yesuss Kiristtossa sunththan xammaqetite, izi immiza Xiillo Ayana inte ekkana.
Oonasikka iita gish iita zaarontta mala naagettite; Gido attin inte inte garssan gidin hara asara gidin wursso wode loo7o gidizayssa oothanas baaxetite.

Hessaththoka attuma asay bees bessiza macasatara zin7anaas bessishin addey addera zin7anaas amon xuugetidi macasatara zin7iza mala addery addera zin7idi pala miishshi oothida. Heytanti berka ba oothida iitta oothozas bessiza qixaate ba bolla ehida.
Hessaththoka intes ufa7etidi tanaka ufayssanas besses.
Hessa gish inte nagaray qucceti dhayana mala marotethan gellite, inte biza oggepe simmite goda matappe inte oraxxana wodey intes yana.
He Katamayn qamay bayinda gishshi izi pengeti ay wodeka gordettettena.
Ta ashsho mizza urasine ta suththu uyzaa uraas wurisoos medhina deyooy dees, taka izzade wuriththetha gaalas hayqqope denththana.
Yesussayka izas zaaridi “sheeney ness Xoossafe immetoonttako nes ta bolla ay godatethika deenashin, gido attin tana nes aththi immidade bolla gita nagaray dees” gides.
Hesathokka oothoy baynda ammanoykka bees hayidayssa.
Nagarancha ashoppe dendidayssan wogay polanaas danida7ontaysa Xoossi ba naaza nagarancha asa lemusson nagaras yarishistana mala yedidi pollides. Hsitidi nagara iza ashon piridides.
Inte lo7o oothida gishshi waaye beykoka inte anjjo ekkana. Asay inte bolla iitta oothanas mandetizayssas babbofitene daro qopofite.
Aawato, nayti ufayss qaxxontta mala inte nayta hanqethopite.
Izi qass dhoqa qaalan hizgi woossides “Gita Babilooneya kundadus! Kundadus! Kundadus! daydantha duussa so gidadus! tuna ayanatas aqoso gidadus! haariza iitta kapotas shempo so gidadus.
Yesussa izi Kirstossa gidena gi kadizadefe hara wordanchay oone? He uray Aawanne naaza kadiiza Kirstossara eqetizadeko.
Hessa gishshi oonka bessontta dishin hayssa uketha miiko woykko Goda ushsha uyiko izadey Goda ashone iza suutha kawushida gishshi izi oychistana.
Neno eeyazo! oothoy baynda ammanos go7ay bayndayssa eranas marikka koyazii?

Hessa gish Yuday wotadarata, qeessista halaqatane Farssawistape kitteti yida ashshikarata wursi kaalleththi ekkidi he istti shiqizaso yidees. Izara yida asay paanoose, xoomipenee mashsha toora oykkidi yidees.
Goday gidiko ammanetidayssa. Izikka intena minnisana; xalaepaka intena naagana.
Izi gede worra yeegettida wode kawwo Farone macca nayya deemada bees ekkadus. Be na mala oothada dichadus.
Hessafe guye kiitanchazi exane izan cuwasizayssa oykkidi yarsho yarshiza sozape tama ekkidi izan kunthidi duge biitta bolla yeggides. Daday, giirethi, wolqanthine biittayka qaaxxides.
Dere asa ubbaa mathoziza ba laymmatetha woyne cajeza ushshadus. Biitta bolla diza kawoti izira Laymmatida. Biitta bolla diza zal7anchati izis diza ishalo duussafe dendidayssan daro duretida”
Hessa gaason Ayhudati ta Xoossa keeththan dishin tana oykkidi wodhdhana koyda.
Tuma siyanape ba haythe haraso zaaradi haysu7e bagga simmana.

Gido attin inte garisan issi issi ammanoontta asat detes. Yesussay isttas hessa giday koyroope dommidi istta garisan ammanoonitayti oonanitakoone qaasse iza aththi immanadeeyka oonakoone erriza gishaskko.
Yesussayka zaaridi “izadey ta hai budena woxen dhim77eda barssizade” gides, hessa gi simmid budena woxen dhim77i ekkid asiqorotepe yida simmona na yuda barisides.
Ximttossa, ne hadara ekkidayssa wurssa naaga. Xoossa bonchisontta hada duuna loommiu loommiupene wordo erateth geetettiza asi beepe medhdhi kessida timirttefe haakka.

Ayhudati qass istta qanatidi giyan diza woriddo asata shishshidi kummetha dere istta bolla denththethidi kaataman shiiro medhdhida. Phawulossane Sillase shishshidi dereza sinththan essanas issi Iyassone geetettizadesoo koyanas elleli bida.

Oonikka ba ishay bena hayqqos gathonta nagara oothishin beyikko izas woosso. Xoossikka hayqos gathonta nagara oothidaytas deyo imana. Hayqos gathiza nagaraykka dees. Hayqos gaathiza nagara gish woso giike.
Ta intes tummu gays ta kittdadee ekkizzadey tana ekes, tana ekkizadey tana kittdade ekkes.
Hessa gishshi nuni muleka qanxxonttayta kawoteth laatanayssa gishshi ane Xoossu galatosu. Qasseka iza ufayssiza ogera bonchosine yashatethan ane izas goynoos.

Yuyi yuyi asape dayidanththi kessiza issi issi Ayhude asati “Phawulossay sabbakiza Yesussa sunththan inte kezzana mala azazayss” giidi Goda sunththa tuna ayanati oykkida asata bolla xeeyigana paaccida.
Phawulossay qass Siillase doorides. Ammanizayitikka phawulossa Goda adho kiyatethas hadara immidape guye izi isttafe shaaketidi biides.
Inte gidikko inte dabura wagape mella atontamalanne kumetha woyytto ekana mala inte hu7es nagetite.
Istti tinbite yootiza he gallasatan iray bukkontta mala salo gordanas maatay isttas dees. Hessaththoka haathata suuthan laamanas Koykoka hara ay aynata bochan biitta shocanas wwolqqay isttas dees.
Ne wozinay Xoossa sinththan suure gidontta gish nes hayssa ha oosozan gishay woykko eexxa deena.
Tas gididay wurikka neysa neysika wurikka taysa, taka isttan bonchetana.
Wurikka balletidane issi bolla go7onttayta gidida. Loo7o oothizay oonikka bawa; issadeykka deena”
Ase wursii intefe bollara xeellite attin interkka intena doson woykko go7ay baynda galata ekanas issi mishika oothopite.
He xompe wothiza balata gidon asa na milatizade demmadis. Izika hiriki too gakkiza adusa mayo mayidi tira bolla worqa mayo mayides.
Hessa gishshi wode wursethi mattides. Inte minni woossanas danda7ana mala wogara diitene wopu gida qofay intes deyo.
Axxalliyapekka ha7i gakkanaas istti ooththida oththoza hadara isttas immeetida kaatama Anxxokiya markkaben gellidi simmida.
Macho ekikoka nagara gidena. Gela7oyaka geliko nagara gidena. Gido attin ekkiza asati, gelizayti hayssa alameza bolla istta daro metoy gakkana. Ta qass hessi inte bolla gakontta aganayssa dosayss.
Gasoyka nu olistanay ashorane suthara gidonta hayssa dhuma alameza hariiza Godatarane wolliqamatara qasekka sallo bolla diza tuna ayanata oolanchatarako. Nu olleetizay.
Inte garssafe oonasikka eratethi pacciko oonakka kadhontta ba kiiyatethara wurisos immiza Xoossa wosso; izadeskka imettana.
Xiillo ayana tama toyssofite.
Kse nam77u kifilera diza dunikaney giigeti dees. Koyro kifilezan xomippe wothosoyne xaraphezay qasse ukethi dees. Hessa he kifilezi dumma kifile geetets.

Ne dure gidana koyko taape taman paacettida worqa shammana mala neni ne kallotetha yeellatetha kamanas bootha mayo mayana malane xelanaska danda7ana mala ayife dhale shammada ne tiyettana mala ta nena zorayss.
Intes Xoossa nan amanizaytas medhina deyoy dizaysa inte erana mala ta hayssa intes xahaaththaays.
Bepe hasaizadeey ba boncho koyyes, kittidade boncho koyzadeey gidiko izi tummancha, wordooy iza bolla denna.
Gido attin hayssi gita woliqay nuus Xoossafe imettides attin nupe gidonttayssa bessana mala haysi boncho miishshay nunan oto milatizayta giddon dees.
Ta siiqoto, inte halo Xoossi kesso attin interika halo kesopite “Halo kesanay tanakko” gees Goday geeteti geeshsha maxaafan xaafetides.
Yesussayka isttas hizzgdees “ta tarkka tana bonchiko ta bonchoy hada, tana bonchizadey gidiko inte “izi nu Xoossa” gizzay ta aawako.
Nuni Miza kaththa gish giidi Xoossa ootho ane laaloko. kathi wurikka geeshkko. Gido attiin hara urasi dhuphe gidiza kaath muusi qass balla oothoko.
He namm7u asati Yesussa aha ekkidi Ayhudatii aha xaxiza mala shiito cacafidii le77e mayora xaxida.
Inte intes harape aadhiza medhinas daana haaroy dizayssa eriza gishshi qachchetidaytas michetidistane inte haaroy bonqetishin ufayssan danda7idista.
Xoossikka ba caaqoo qaaladan ha addeeza zeereththafe ass ashshizade Yesussa isiraeles ehidees.
Gido attin geesha maxaafan “Asa ayfey beyonttazi, asa haythi siyonttazi, asa wozinayka qoponttazi Xoossi ba dosizaytas giigisides” gees.
Yesusa hayqope dinthida iza ayanay inte bolla diza gidiko Kiristoosa hayqope denthidaysa inte gidon diza iza ayanay hayqanas diza inte asatethas deyo immana.
Nuni Xoossa nayta gididaysa he ayanay ba baggara nu ayanara issife nuusu marikatees.
Baletofite Xoosi qlicca erena. Assi ba zeridaro iza zera buccana.

Hessa gishshi Xoossa kiyatethine iza menxxe iittatetha ane xeella. Iza menxxe iittethay kunididayta bollakko. Iza kiyatethay qasse inte iza qadhetetha garisan diza wode gakanaas xalalakko. Hessi baynida aggiko intekka qanixistana.
Hessa gish ta ishato Goday ha yaana gakanas danda7ite. Goshshe goyizadey biittay loo7o kathth kaxxana gakanaas wani danda7izakone balgo/asura/ irane ofintha ira izi wostti naagizako ane akekkite.
Heneessifore soo asa Goday maaro, ayss giikko izi taana daro wode minthethidesinne; ta sanththalatan qachchista dishin tana beeyidi yeellatibeyina.
Hesa gish nayto izi qonciza wode nusu xalatethi danamala izi yiza wodeka nu iza sinthan yeletonta mala inte izan deyte.
Hessa gish ta intena ayanan simeretite gays asho amoka polopite.
Yesuss Kiristtossay nagaranchata ashshanaas duge hayssa ha alame yides giza qaalay tumane asi wurkka ekkanas bessizayssako. Nagaranchatapekka aadhdhiza nagaranchay tanako.
Hara bagara miino Godaninne iza gita woliqana minite.
Hessa gishshi ta minna eqa days gizadey dikko kunidontta mala bessi naageto.
Gaasoyka issi to shiishida yarshon geyana asata medhinas geeshides.
Ayhudati iza caadanas qasseka shuchchu denththida.
Gido attin ta inte erana mala koyzay atumasas wursos hu7ey Kiristoosa gididayssa mala atumasay maccashas wursos hu7ekko. Qasse Xoossi Kiristoosas hu7ekko.
Issi issi asati asan kaa7ettida. Garafettida. Bagayti qasse qachcho keethi gelida.
Nuka shempo teqe gidida minone ammanithiza ufayss demmides. He ufayssayka magalashazape guye baggara gede Xoossa keeththa gido gelees.
Ayfey baynda dhuma oothora intes ayko gagotethi dopo. Hessafe iita ootho qoncce kesite.

Ta ishato inte inte garisan issay issay motoopite ba isha motizadeynne ba isha bolla piridizadey woga bolla iitta hasa7esinne woga bolla piridees. Ne woga bolla pirdizade attin woga naagizade gidakka.
He tammane nam7u pengetika tammane nam7u inqotakko. Pengeti wurka issay issay issi inqofe oothetida he katamay giddo ogey masttote mala haa zaari bessiza muuruta worqafe oothetides.
Kiristoosay gidiko Xoossa keeththa bolla ammanetida na malako. Nunika iza bolla ammanetiza ufayssayne ceeqetiza ufaysi lo7ethi oykiko nu izaso duusa keeth gidos.
Inte siqotethi qoodhepe qomo gidopo. Iitta gididayssa wursikka ixxite. Loo7o gididayssara issife oykettite.

He saateyinka wolqama biitta qaathi handes. He katamas tammafe issi kushey laalettides. Biitta qaatha gaason laapun shi derey hayqides. hayqontta attida asay qass daro babbidesine Salo Xoossaka bonchides.
Gidikkoka ganazi isa baga xala xelizade gidena. Xoossi gidiko izi isa xala.
Hessa gish Philaxxossay “ne tas yootiki? ta nena kaqqanas woykko birsha yedanas godatethi tas dizayssa errikii?” gides.
Izi nababiiza maaxxahaaththaay “Izi dorssa mala shukeistana laagetides, dorssa laaqqay iththike qanxxizade sinththan co7u giza mala hessathokka izi ba duuna poggibeyna.
Hessafe guye derey ba bolla kawoo kawoothana mala Samela wossides, Xoossikka Biiname baggafe Qisse na Sa7olle isttas immides. Izika istta oyddu tammu laythth hariidees.
Waysizaytine dunan xalala balethzayti daroti detes; harapekka heyti qaxaretida Ayhuda asatape ammanida asata bagatakko.
He mayooza bolla oyddu toyi diza dumma dumma doo7ati biitara gochchetiza medhetethatine saloo bolla piradhdhiza kahaaththaotti deetes.
Nunii nu garssan issno gidida mala isttika ba garssan issino gidana mala ne tas ida boncho taka isttas immadis.
Ne taape siyida timirtteza Yesuss Kiristtoosara issipetethan diza ammanonine siiqqon lemuso histtada oyykka.
Ayhudatas geshshoo wogayi diza gish usupuuni shuchchafe medhdhetiida gaanetti heen iza ollan dettes, isittikka issay issay nam77u otto wayeko hedzdzuu otto hathth oyikkes.
Wozinama gidite; nagara oothopite; Xoossu eronttayti issi issi asati inte garisan diza gishshi ta hessa intena yeelachanas gayss.
Muleka ashikistane shugista gidite. Issay isara siiqon diitene isay isa danda7ite.
Issi issi asata tamape kesi ashite haratas yashatethan michettite shin nagaran tunida istta asatetha bochchida mayoka wuris ixxite.
Xoossi bena dosizaytasine iza shene mala xeeygetidaytasi wurisos oothiza miishshi wursikka lo7os oothizaysa nu erosu.
Inte mishshiracho qaalas azazetizayta gididayssa asi wuri siyides. Hessika tana daro ufayssides. Gidikkoka inte lo7o hanos cinccata qasse iitta oothos eeyata gidana mala ta koyays.

Hessa gidon worqqafe oothetida exane cu7asiza pili7o malayne worqqan meeshettida caaqo Taabootay dees. He tabotayka iza gidon man7ay diza worqqa leematey, cililida Aaroone gufeyne caaqo qaalati iza bolla xaafetida shuchcha masethi dees.
